Job Description:
- Control Quality Of Product.
- Prepare Record For Quality Assurance.
- Prepare Necessary Documents For ISO9001 2007.
Job Requirement:
- Have ISO Qualification 
- Bachelor Degree Of Any Field.
- Age: 25 ~ 35 
- Sex: Female & Male
- Knowledge Of Quality Assurance. 
- At Least 2 Years’ Experience With QA
- Be Good Writing & Speaking In English.
- Make Full Use Of Microsoft Word, Excel And PowerPoint.
- Tenacity And Enthusiasm To Perform The Wide Variety Of Tasks
- Can Work Under Pressure And Deadline.
Company Profile: HRINC is the leading provider of HR Services to the Cambodia market and expanding to the South East Asia region.  We support multinational companies and leading ASEAN conglomerates and SMEs with their Human Resource needs, from consulting and market intelligence, to outsourcing and compliance as well as recruitment.
Contact Info: Contact Information RUOS Sytha HR Manager  +855 (23) 211437  Building #10, Oknha Pich Avenue (Street 242), Sankat Chaktumok, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh   +855 (23) 211437

Job Description:
•	Can do BOQ ( Bill of Quality )
•	Can use AutoCAD, 3D
•	Directly manages the development of architectural designs and preliminary construction details.
•	Ensures architectural design work is completed on time and adheres to the established specifications and standards.
•	Prepare sketches, production drawings and detailed drawings by hand or using computer-aided design (CAD) software
•	Combine structural, mechanical and artistic elements into the building design, such as decks and atriums, lifts, air conditioning systems and decorative finishes
•	Discuss designs and cost estimates in the project, including engineers, quantity surveyors, landscape architects, and urban and regional planners
•	Observe, inspect and monitor building work to ensure it is progressing according to the specifications
•	Evaluate projects once they are completed and occupied.
•	Perform other related duties as required
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree of Interior design / Architect or equivalent
•	Fresh graduated who have no experience will be considered 
•	Technical qualification in construction related discipline
•	Knowledge of general management skills for a construction project 
•	Knowledge about design and construction principals and drawing/workflow for admin, planning and drawing
•	Proficiency in spoken and written English with good interpersonal skills ( Chinese proficiency is preferable)
•	Proficiency in relevant office software ( Ms. office and able to use Auto Cad)
Company Profile: HRINC is the leading provider of HR Services to the Cambodia market and expanding to the South East Asia region.  We support multinational companies and leading ASEAN conglomerates and SMEs with their Human Resource needs, from consulting and market intelligence, to outsourcing and compliance as well as recruitment.

Job Description:
- Satellite Arrangement 
 ○Settlement Of Outdoor Broadcasting Van, Like Live Event In Local Or International Broadcasting 
 ○ Booking Satellite Space For Occasional Usage 
 ○ Responsible For Satellite Renting For Feeding To Abroad
 ○ Checking Space For OB Van To Park For Feeding. 
- Satellite Uplink OB Van 
 ○ Verify All The Parameters From Satellite Service Provider: Transponder Name, Channel Name, Bandwidth Slot, Polarization, Frequency Band, Symbol Rate, Forward Error Correction And So On.
 ○ Perform Utilities For Uplink And Parameters Input To Be Synchronized With The Equipment Support: Link Budget Calculation EIRP Up And Down, Video And Audio Bitrate 
 ○ Do The Dish Alignment To Find Out The Maximum Signal 
 ○ Test The Uplink Power With Pure Carrier Or CW And Modulation Carrier Also Cross Pol Interference 
 ○ Check Receiving Signal With Spectrum Analyzer To Make Sure It Over The Threshold Level Or Receiver Sensitivity. 
 ○ Satellite Downlink Station 
 ○ Do The Alignment With OB Van For Receiving The Particular Television Channel In Order To Do Live Broadcast
 ○ Find Out The Azimuth And Elevation Of The Desired Satellite Downlink
 ○ Monitoring The Acceptable Level Of Audio And Video Quality Like Signal Level (Link Margin), Carrier To Noise (C/N), Energy Of Bit (Eb/No)
 ○ Select The Frequency, Modulation DVBS, DVBS2, Bandwidth, Polarization, Encryption Type For Doing Live Broadcast With Existing Satellite Dish 
 ○ Record Special Program Feed Like UEFA Champion Magazine, International Live Event Testing, And Live Program Like International Boxing , Football,...
 ○ Communicate With Abroad To Find Out The Problem In Case Of Having Trouble With The Reception Carrier.
- Satellite Uplink Earth Station 
 ○ Maintenance Uplink Equipment, Modem, Upconverter , And So On 
 ○ Calculate Earth Isotropic Radiation Power Up
 ○ Monitoring And Investigate The Acceptable Level Of Signal Level By Calculating Earth Isotropic Radiation Down Compare To Desired Particular Downlink Station Along With Signal Level, Bit Error Rate.
- Microwave Terrestrial Link 
 ○ Check The Tx And Rx Height, Make Sure It Over The Fresnel Zone 
 ○ Examine The Output Power And The Medium Link To ODU
 ○ Align The Dish At Tx To Rx
 ○ Connect Audio And Video Into The IDU.
Job Requirement:
- Degree In Electrical Engineer, Engineer 
- Have 3 – 5 Year Experience In Similar Capacity
- Good Personality.

Job Description:
- Designing, Installing, Operating And Maintaining Of Electrical Systems, Lighting, Heating And Ventilation 
- Designing/producing/drawing Electrical Systems Using Computer Design Auto Cad 2D & 3D.
- Working On Systems For The Generation, Distribution, Utilization And Control Of Electric Power.
- Plan And Design Power Stations And Equipment For Generators
- Assembling, Testing, Commissioning And Maintaining Electrical Panel To Make Sure They Run Smoothly Based On The Specification
- Make Sure That Completed Works Meet Specifications And Safety Standards 
- Other Tasks Are Assigned By Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Degree In Electrical Engineering And Other Equivalent Degree 
- Must Have Experience At Least 1 Year
- Good At Auto Cad 2D & 3D 
- Having Knowledge In IT Is Priority
- Good Oral And Written English And Khmer Communication Skills
- Good Negotiation Skills, Interpersonal Skills, And Problem Solving Skills
- Be Friendly, Flexible, Honestly, Hard-working, And Be Able To Work Under The Pressure.

Job Description:
1.Report to Senior IT Officer in routine and ad-hoc duties assigned.
2.Maintain the IT Asset inventory/movement and ensure it’s properly updated.
3.Plan and schedule SQL server database maintenance. 
4.Daily monitor files/database backup.
5.Monitor server performance and ensure it’s running smoothly.
6.Manage and monitor file server security.
7.Responsible for Network operation support. 
8.Responsible for E-mail operation and support.
9.Responsible for daily MIS operations and admin support.
10.Work with suppliers to handle hardware and software purchase and issue.
11.Daily monitor all Anti-virus reports (definition status, risk infect..).
12.Responsible for any other duties assigned as and when required.
Job Requirement:
1.Recognized degree in computer professional.
2.Preferably 1 or 2 years’ experience of maintenance network and computer software/hardware 
3.Sound knowledge of operational information systems duties, proficient in Microsoft Office 
application, local network area, wide network area, Database, good command in spoken and 
written English.
4.Honest, sincere hard working, cooperative, initiative, responsible and ability to 
prioritize works to meet schedule.

job title: SALE & MARKETING MANAGER,  SALE & MARKETING IN DOOR & OUT DOOR
position: SALE & MARKETING MANAGER,  SALE & MARKETING IN DOOR & OUT DOOR
Job Description:
SALE & MARKETING MANAGER 

  Job Responsibilities:
  - Handle and control overall Sale & Marketing operation
  - Supervise teams work to achieve company’s objective and goal.
  - Ensure the sale turnover is maintenance at profitable level, analysis and propose a realistic solution during down turn.
  - Plan monthly promotion with promote record and promotion efficacy submit to principal.
  - Forecast inventory and put up realistic order to meet monthly sales volume/turnover.
Liaise with Principals closely and update them with necessary information requested all promotion claims are to be submitted to principal on time.
  - Assist all sales teams’ matters and day to day operation. And constantly update to immediate boss on market information and daily issues.
  - Develop new market and new opportunity in new area or territory.
  - Understand and aware of competitor price and their activities.
  - Preparing the new strategy to fight at the strong whole area of competitors.
  - Responsible for the credit collection is at healthy level and ensure the credit terms are within the stipulated time frame.
  - Plan and forecast a sound sales target for individual team to implement as well as whole department to achieve.
  - Plan and check on the sales team’s route or territory regularly to improve sales distribution and sales turnover
  - To motivate the sales staffs to work efficiently on time to time.
  - Provide proper training and guidance to staffs.
  - Evaluate sales’ staff performance and submit appraisal yearly.
  - Prepare weekly, monthly and yearly report to General Manager.


SALE & MARKETING IN DOOR & OUT DOOR

Job Responsibilities:
- Find target customer to sale products by calling or meet directly.
- Follow up customer to push selling.
- Create new idea in products, sale, and doing marketing to increate sale volume.
- Keep and build good relationship with Customers
- Solve problem to customer if have.
- Report sale result to direct management.
- Work closely with delivery team to make sure products are delivery to customer on time.
Job Requirement:
SALE & MARKETING MANAGER 

  Job Requirement:
  - Experience in sale & marketing at least 3 years.
  - Good reading, speaking and listening English, can speak Chinese is advantage.
  - Have power in self.
  - Self confident, strong in communication and flexible.
  - Strong problem solving and coordination.
  - Ready to commit to results.
  - Good at computer literacy: Ms. word - Excel, Internet & Email
  - Able to work under pressure.
  - High salary will be provided base on work experience and performance.


SALE & MARKETING IN DOOR & OUT DOOR

  Job Requirement:
  - Male or Female.
  - Experience in sale & marketing at least 3 months.
  - Fairly good reading, speaking and listening English, can speak Chinese is advantage.
  - Self confident, strong communication and flexible.
  - Strong problem solving and coordination.
  - Ready to commit to results.
  - Good at computer literacy: Ms. word - Excel, Internet & Email
  - Able to work under pressure.
  - High salary will be provided base on performance.
Company Profile: We are looking for many candidates who have got skill in Accounting and Finance to work in company partners. Higher benefit will be provided base on skill & Knowledge. Woman are encouraged to apply.

Job Description:
Our client is an international humanitarian and development organization from Seoul, Korea that originated as a non-profit, non-governmental organization in 1991. Currently, we are seeking for the potential candidate to fulfill the position of Training and Development Officer.

+ Responsibilities :
- Identifying training and development needs for GNC staffs.
- Designing staff capacity building program and coordinating GNC’s learning events.
- Developing training modules/sessions of training identification.
- Facilitating training and processes that develop and refine community empowering tools, toolkit, and guidelines that are integrated into CDP 
processes.
- Supporting the learning culture within Good Neighbors Cambodia (GNC) that values and disseminates learning from the field or other sources of best 
practices/ lessons learnt.
- Facilitating and coordinating best practices, case studies, most significant changes and other learning events for website updates. 
- Amending and revising programmers as necessary in order to adapt to changes occurring in the Community Development Project.
- Conducting field coaching support after staff training provided.
- Monitoring and reviewing the progress of trainees through questionnaires and discussions with managers.
- Evaluating training and development programmers.
- Assisting Operation Department Manager to consolidate monthly report, quarterly report and review semi-annual/annual reports and annual review.
- Other tasks assigned by the line manager.

+ Requirements:
- Strong presentation, facilitation, analytically and coaching skills.
- Excellent interpersonal communication skill, and ability to work closely and superlatively within a team
- Demonstrated knowledge of development theory, transformation development, community-based-development models, approaches and issues
- PC S Kills : Word / Excel / Outlook /  PowerPoint

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary : $ 400 - $ 500
- Working Day : Monday - Saturday(haft) 
- Working Time:  8:00 am- 12:00 am | 1:00 pm-5:00 pm
- Holiday : Sat (Half) / Sun / Legal holiday

requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. 
-  At least 2 years experience with Wordpress CMS (design integration, customization from scratch, 
modules development…)
-  Minimum 2 years experiences with HTML/CSS, PHP/MySQL, CSS, Ajax, JavaScript, Jquery
-  Experience in MySQL Database (analyze, data model conception, queries)
-  Good analytical and problem solving skills with demonstrated ability to analyze technical information and 
work with a team spirit.
-  Strong knowledge of development best practices, and methodologies.
-  Self-motivated and proactive
-  Strong verbal and written skills (English)
-  Willing to learn the new skills required by the assigned tasks.

Job Description:
Unique Translation Services is a professional agency, working in translation and localization industry. Currently, we have some people working as our freelance translators, but due to the expansion of the business and the growing needs of our clients, we are looking for additional highly professional and qualified freelance translators. If this sounds interesting to you and you are responsive, dedicated, reliable, and looking for freelancing opportunities in addition to your full-time or part-time job, we are inviting you to join our fast-growing team, then. 

We are looking for freelance translators in the following language pairs: 

1-	English to Khmer and vice versa (Preferable IT & Legal-related backgrounds)
2-	French to Khmer and vice versa 
3-	Chinese to Khmer and vice versa 
4-	Thai to Khmer and vice versa
5-	Laotian to Khmer and vice versa 
6-	Vietnamese to Khmer and vice versa
7-	Japanese to Khmer and vice versa
8-	Korean to Khmer and vice versa
9-	Cross languages: 
a.	English to Laotian and vice versa
b.	English to Thai and vice versa
c.	English to Vietnamese and vice versa
d.	English to Korean and vice versa
e.	English to Chinese and vice versa
f.	English to Japanese and vice versa
g.	English to French and vice versa

1- BA or any degree in linguistics in the language you are applying for, or relevant work experience 
2- Fluency in the language you are applying for 
3- Ability to meet tight deadline 
4- Internet access with fast speed
5- Professional attitude 
6- Results-oriented 
7- Open to learn and share
8- Be flexible to urgency and be fully responsible for the assigned tasks

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ngoy Manith (Mr.)   017 206 333/010 200 005/023 991 003 No.36, St.169, PPIU Building, 4th Floor, Veal Vong, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia   017 206 333/010 200 005/023 991 003

Job Description:
Summary of Position
Our client is a well-established franchising bakery from Singapore.The Procurement Manager will be in charge of the purchasing needs of a company. He/she will be based in Phnom Penh.

Main Duties and Responsibilities
•	Lead and develop the purchasing team to manage the whole order fulfillment cycle from sourcing to delivery to provide for timely solution for the business.
•	Formulate policies and set operating procedures for inventory management and to supervise the daily operations including stock control, stock-re-order level, and the movement of stock are at all times efficient and effective.
•	Responsible for the scheduling, and purchasing plan for raw materials, as well as the compiling of the monthly purchase and inventory report and price analysis
•	Responsible for all purchasing activities, such as price/trade terms negotiations.
Monitor supplier’s performance measurement and execution of corrective action plans.
•	Continuously review all aspects of the operations procedure and SOP to improve internal Key Performance Indicators to meet the business objectives of the Company.
•	Regularly prepare various reports and analysis including inventory budget report and provide recommendations for management review.

Reporting
•	To the CEO
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s Degree in purchasing and supply chain management or equivalent
solid experience in sourcing and purchasing of raw materials
•	Minimum 3-5 years’ experience in purchasing and inventory management of which 3 years at managerial level gained from sizable organization.
•	Excellent planning, organizing, and analytical skills 
•	Highly effective, dynamic, and result-oriented with strong sense of responsibility.
•	Familiar with ERP system is highly desired but not mandatory.
•	Able to work under pressure to meet tight schedule.
•	Good sourcing and connecting network for relevant vendors with strong material cost management experience.
•	Good command of both spoken and written English, knowledge of other Asian languages is a plus.

Job Description:
JOB TITLE		: Sales Supervisor 
REPORTING TO		: Senior Sales Supervisor
DEPARTMENT	 	: Sales and Distribution
LOCATION		: Battambang

Job Purpose:
	Responsible for managing, controlling and monitoring daily sales of Bancassurance in assigned area in order to achieve high level of customer satisfaction, efficiency and productivity.
Main Tasks & Job Responsibilities:
	Responsible for assigned monthly APE and Policy target and year-end target of APE and Policy. 
	LISs performance monitoring.
	Provide immediate support to LISs in customer handling
	Review the area management KPIs and take necessary actions to achieve the target KPIs.
	Keep coaching and training LISs to understand all our products and services
	Build intimacy with branch manager and management team of ACLEDA Branches.
	Prepare and implement monthly activities including customer presentation and joint visit with LISs.
	Liaise with other departments on matters relating to daily sales activities.
	Perform other duties/target as assigned by Senior Sales Supervisor
Key Accountabilities:
	Meet all the deadlines and requirements of individual/ team assignments and projects
	Due to the nature of this job, the incumbent will play as a representative of company. He therefore must:
	Demonstrate high level of integrity, courtesy, self-discipline, and professionalism
	Be confident and mature with positive attitude
	Be respectful
	Be always caring and understanding.
	Be able to handle effectively all queries in professional manner
	Build effective relationships both within and outside the department; seek input from and maintain effective ongoing communication with others
	Dress always attitude
Job Requirement:
Key Success Factors:
	A College degree in business administration majoring in marketing, or business related field.
	A minimum of 2 year experience in a supervisory position in Customer Service or Sales
	Ability to manage and work independently.
	Ability to think creatively and take initiative.
	Analytical skills and demonstrate positive attitude
	Excellent business communication skills, commendable in English language both in speaking and writing. 
	Computer literacy in Microsoft offices applications.

The Company offers a competitive remuneration package with highly fixed income plus variable bonus and attractive long term career prospect and a professional, transparent, and exciting environment.
If you’re interested and think you’re the right person, please submit your CV with cover letter and a recent photo (4x6) to HR Department by using the contact detail below: 

Website: www.prudential.com.kh  
Email: sovandara.hong@prudential.com.kh 
Phone: 023 964 555

Deadline: No later than 10 Jan 2015 at 5:30PM

Phnom Penh Address:  Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh. 

Notes: Certificates and supporting documents attached should be brought along when you are invited for interview.

Women and the disabled are encouraged to apply. Only short-listed candidates will be notified for interview. Received applications will not be returned.
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sovandara Hong  (855) 23 964 555 Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh  (855) 23 964 555

o	Meet with colleagues to discuss the business objectives and requirements of projects.
o	Interpret the business needs and develop concepts to suit our goals and markets.
o	Estimate time required to complete project tasks and list any assumptions or limitations in meeting those targets.
o	Think creatively to produce new ideas and concepts.
o	Present finalized ideas and concepts to creative team and colleagues proactively with options.
o	Proofread, test and quality check to ensure accurate and high-quality output.
o	Create design, layouts and artwork pages ready for print.
o	Keep abreast of emerging methods, technologies and approaches in new media; particularly design programs, web and social media.
o	Contribute ideas and design artwork to project briefs managed by colleagues.
o	Develop interactive design web.
o	Work as part of a team with printers, stylists, illustrators, other designers, managers, web developers and digital marketing team.
Job Requirement:
•	The following details are prerequisites to applying for this position. 
o	Minimum of 1 year of experience working in a dedicated graphic design role.
o	Skilled use of Adobe Creative Suite: primarily Illustrator, Photoshop and InDesign. Experience with web and flash animation is also appreciated.
o	Ability to apply skills creatively to a wide range of project types for a variety of markets.
o	Web design experience with a sound knowledge of modern standards, methods and approach.
o	Knowledge of design requirements for print, digital and other common media.
o	Ability to work precisely under pressure with adherence to deadlines.
o	Understand the need for originality and how to avoid plagiarism.
o	Accuracy and attention to detail.
o	A matter-of-fact approach when ideas or designs are rejected.
o	The ability to balance work on several projects at a time
o	Good in English – both written and spoken
o	A confident and effective communicator and team player – you will need to effectively communicate project needs and ideas with colleagues.
o	Be someone who enjoys working with others, at times under pressure and with a flexible attitude required to get any project completed at a high level of quality and within project constraints.
•	Other Attributes
o	The following aspects are beneficial to the role and having these will help qualify you for the position
	Ability to speak in Khmer, Vietnamese or Thai is a plus
	Understanding of needs, abilities, tools and goals of related project workers such as web developers, content creators, search engine optimisers, social media managers and marketing consultants.
	Proven working track record of professionalism, loyalty, honesty and flexibility.

Salary and Benefits
•	The right candidate will receive a benefit package to suit the value they bring to the company.
•	Amount negotiable.

Our client is one of the leading international company specialized in production and development of premium packaging. We are partner to some of the world’s leading brands in the sports and fashion industry. The Factory Manager will be in charge of taking the operations responsibility, and will internally be grown to take over role of General Manager in 3 years. She/ He will be based in Siem Reap.

•	Manage optimum costing of production activities 
•	Improve processes and policies in support of company goals
•	Manage the Plant safety and operation

•	Liaise with other team members, including interacting with managers of different areas of the organization
•	Oversee the HR activities and effective people management in factory or units
•	Supervise new employees, track and measure staff performance.
•	Oversee and supervise inventory, warehouse, quality 

Reporting
To the General Manager

Requirements

Job Description:
Main purpose of Job:

To Lead and Manage all operations within the company to ensure the attainment of all performance targets in 
terms of turnover, profits, costs, yield and in accordance with the Company visions, business objectives and compliance requirements which are established and approved by the Board of Directors.

Job duties:

Contribute to the development of the company’s corporate strategy and implement strategic goals to ensure that the appropriate policies and management systems are developed to meet the corporate mission and management visions. 

Financial Reporting:

- Prepare Financial Reports for company performance
- Prepare budget & forecast for companies sales

Sales & Marketing Management:

- Marketing Planning to build more brand awareness
- Create Marketing Calendar to propose to the Board
- Implement & execute sales promotions for shops
Store Operation and Management
- Implement sales plans according to Marketing Calendar for in-store promotions
- Inventory control and order management
- Training and education for related employees

Wholesale Operation and Management:

- Finding potential clients
- Negotiation with clients
- Planning of sales / promotion plan and implementation of sales / promotion plan

Overall Labor management:

Capital (money) management and control
Reporting to Head Quarters and communication with Head Quarters

Application requirements:

Familiar with Financial reports (Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet, Cash flow, etc.)

Company Profile:
Formally known as American Academy of Language and Art (AALA), ELT was founded by US entrepreneurs who strongly believed that education was a foundation in rebuilding the lives of Cambodian civilians. EESS is part of the ELT institution which offers many classes ranging from grades one to twelve. Students are given the opportunity to undertake studies in both Khmer and English which has been inspired by the learning and teaching standards of America. The Cambodian Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport recognizes the school’s commitment to education and has granted the rights for EESS to issue diplomas after meeting the credit requirements.

Due to students’ willingness and persistency in rebuilding their lives through education, the management team of ELT institution was able to introduce Cambodian International University in 2010. CamIU was established with the hope of providing students with Advanced Diploma, Intensive Diploma, Associate Degree, Bachelor’s Degree and Master Degrees that are widely recognized by the Cambodian Government. 

Over the years, ELT institution has made tremendous progress. In the beginning of 2010, there were 375 registered staff members and 5850 enrolled students. The prestigious reputation of ELT Group continues to grow and will do so through the strong leadership of its management team.

Job Description:
Collaborate with personnel and plan and develop recipes and menus including creation of menu and presentation of menu.
Supervise and coordinate activities of cooks and workers engaged in food preparation.
Wash pots, pans, dishes, utensils, and other cooking equipment.
Portion, arrange, and garnish food, and serve food to waiter or patron.
Inspect supplies, equipment, and work areas to ensure conformance to health standards.
Determine production schedules and worker-time requirements.
Estimate amounts and costs and requisition supplies and equipment.
Train and instruct cooks and workers in proper food preparation procedures.
Wash, peel, cut, and seed fruits and vegetables.
Weigh, measure, and mix ingredients, season and cook food according to recipes or personal judgment.
Butcher, cut and bone meat, fowl or shellfish prior to cooking.
Bake, roast, broil, steam, carve and trim meats, fish, vegetables and other foods.
Bake bread, rolls, cakes, pastry and desserts.
Job Requirement:
Skills and Qualifications :
-Monitor processes, material, and surroundings.
-Teach others.
-Coach and develop others.
-Staff organizational units.
-Judge the qualities of objects, services, or people.
-Make decisions and solve problems.
-Organize, plan, and prioritize.
-Evaluate information against standards. 
-Scheduling work and activities.
-Handle and move objects. 
-Perform general physical activities. 
- Identify objects, actions, and events. 
- Control machines and processes.
- Document and record information.
- Implement ideas, programs, systems, or products.
- Estimate the characteristics of materials, products, events or information. 
- Get information needed to do the job. 
- Inspect equipment, structures, or materials. 
- Monitor and control resources. 
- Communicate with supervisors, peers, or subordinates.
- Coordinate the work and activities of others. 
- Guide, direct, and motivate subordinates. 
- Responsible for kitchen report and the purchasing and inventory of the restaurant. 
- Testing Recipes.
- Recording Supply Use.

Benefits :
- Monthly bonus based on sales
- Early bonus based on performance
- Healthy insurance
- Daily meals
- Transport (conditions apply)
- Annual leave
- Allowance for food testing
- Paid training schedule
- Annual outing

- មានសីលធម៌ការងារល្អ

- ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេសខ្លះៗ
Company Profile:
ហត្ថាយ៉ប/HATHA JOB ជាមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលធនធានមនុស្ស ផ្តល់ការពិគ្រោះ ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ជួយស្វែងរក និងជួយផ្លាស់ប្តូរការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាជិត១០ហើយ។ មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលក៏ជាទីកន្លែងជួយស្វែងរការងារនិងផ្គត់ផ្គង់បុគ្គលិកជូនក្រុមហ៊ុនដៃគូ។ បច្ចុប្បន្ននៅតែជាកន្លែងជួយស្វែងរកនិងជួយផ្លាស់ប្តូរការងារជូនប្រជាជនដើម្បីទទួលបាន ការងារតាមការពេញចិត្ត លើសពីនេះក៏មានបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនូវភាសាការងារនិងជំនាញការងារមួយចំនួនដើម្បីជួយយុវជន នារីទទួលបានការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ​។
            +++++++++++++++++++++
Hatha Job ឱកាសការងារជាប្រចាំសំរាប់លោកអ្នកជ្រើសរើសនិងផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ៖
1- គ្រប់គ្រងការងារផ្ទះ/Home careមានអាហារស្នាក់ 200$-300$
2- សេវាកម្មហាង ភោជនីយដ្ឋានមានអាហារស្នាក់ 150$-200$
3- ទីផ្សារ/លក់ 300$- 1000$
4- រដ្ឋបាល/គណនេយ្យជំនាញ200$-1000$
5- ជាងជំនាញ(ដែក អ៊ីណុក កញ្ចក់ ឈើ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ សំណង់ ភ្លើង
 ដេរសំលៀកបំពាក់...300$- 800$ 
6-អ្នកជំនាញមាន ចុងភៅ ពេទ្យ វិស្វករ ស្ថាបត្យករ.. 300$-800$
7- កម្មករទូទៅ $170- $230
8- គ្រូបង្រៀន/អ្នកបកប្រែ ៖ ភាសាខ្មែរ អង់គ្លេស ចិន ជប៉ុន....200$-700$
9- អ្នកបើកបរ(ក្បាល2, 3 ,4 ,5,) $200- $300
10- អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង (supervisor​​ to manager ) $350- $2000
Hatha Job ទទួលបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដោយមិនបង់ប្រាក់នូវជំនាញការងារដូចជា
កូនជាងបច្ចេកទេស(ដែក អ៊ីណុក កញ្ចក់ ឈើ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ សំណង់ ភ្លើង ..គណនេយ្យហាត់ការ និងរដ្ឋបាលហាត់ការ (ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ)

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
Assist in implementation of an overall AMK’s risk management framework 
 	Establish all risk management and compliance reports and maintain relevant documentation
 	Manage the process of identifying and assessing the risks affecting the business of AMK
 	Oversee and implement the action plans of risk control, compliance with regulations of NBC and liaise with regulators
 	Monitor developments in the regulatory framework and proactively adapt risk management process and procedure whenever necessary
 	Organize appropriate internal and external risk reporting
 	Provide training on risk management and compliance issue to senior management and staff
 	Monitor compliance and report unfavorable deviations following the company’s internal procedures and the regulatory procedures on such matters
 	Provide Support to the Branch/Sub-branch regarding Anti-Money Laundering and the Countering of Terrorist Financing.
Job Requirement:
At least Bachelor degree; preferably Economics, Finance, Accounting, Law
 	At least 3 years-experience in risk management in Banking or MFIs or similar industry
 	Knowledge of laws and regulations and MFI standards
 	Knowledge of statistics, data collection, analysis, and data presentation
 	PC skills, Word, Power point, and Excel (graphs, charts, formulas etc.)
 	Good understanding of financial institution business including systems, reporting infrastructure and product structure/packaging, regulatory requirements, business and market dynamics, and key risk drivers
 	Excellent verbal and written communication skills – ability to liaison with cross functional groups, present results to management, and create effective presentations
 	Ability to multi-task and to work independently: drive for results.

Job Description:
Accomplishes restaurant human resource objectives by recruiting, selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising, and reviewing job contributions; planning and reviewing compensation actions; enforcing policies and procedures.
Achieves restaurant operational objectives by contributing information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; preparing and completing action plans; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; completing audits; identifying trends; determining system improvements; implementing change.
Meets restaurant financial objectives by forecasting requirements; preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions.
Plans menus by consulting with chefs; estimates food costs and profits; adjusts menus.
Controls costs by reviewing portion control and quantities of preparation; minimizing waste; ensuring high quality of preparation.
Avoids legal challenges by conforming to the regulations of the alcoholic beverage commission.
Maximizes bar profitability by ensuring portion control; monitoring accuracy of charges.
Publicizes the restaurant by designing and placing advertisements; inviting food editors to review the restaurant; contacting local, regional, and national magazines with feature ideas; encouraging local businesses to hold social events at the restaurant.
Maintains safe, secure, and healthy environment by establishing, following, and enforcing sanitation standards and procedures; complying with legal regulations; securing revenues; developing and implementing disaster plans; maintaining security and sprinkler systems; maintaining parking lot and walkways.
Maintains ambiance by controlling lighting, background music, linen service, glassware, dinnerware, and utensil quality and placement; monitoring food presentation and service.
Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications; maintaining personal networks; participating in professional organizations.
Enhances department and organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments.
Job Requirement:
Performance Management, People Management, Coaching, Supervision, Staffing, Business Knowledge, Technical Leadership, Technical Management, Vision, Project Management, Planning, Foster Teamwork, Giving Feedback, Customer Service, Developing Budgets, Self-Motivated, Energy Level, Multi-tasking, Resolving Conflict, Verbal Communication.

Benefits :
- Monthly bonus based on sales
- Early bonus based on performance
- Healthy insurance
- Daily meals
- Transport (conditions apply)
- Annual leave
- Allowance for food testing
- Paid training schedule
- Annual outing

Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

Job Description:
- Ensure that the Parts Department achieves its financial objectives by ongoing (period by period) examination of management accounts, system information, daily operating controls and manufacturer’s composite figures (monthly). 
- Ensure premises and equipment and other assets are controlled and used effectively.
- Organize Parts sales promotions to boost sales at appropriate opportunities such as summer holiday period, winter checks etc., co-ordinating marketing plans with service and other departments.
- Review with the Service Manager, all open job cards (daily) and report any ongoing and occurring work in progress problems to the After Sales Manager.
- Produce reports on stock levels and parts sales and be able to keep both retail customers and the service department updated on all back ordered parts and monitor ETA of parts ordered
- Minimize VOR, Emergency Order and other charges by careful and planned use of parts ordering facilities, without adversely impacting on customer satisfaction
- Purchase stock of parts, components and accessories within agreed levels and stocking parameters.
- Design, set up and maintain parts and accessory displays in other departments to promote the sale of parts and accessories 
- Investigate and resolve customer complaints, keeping records of these together with customer congratulations for present and future use. Use results of this information to determine actions to be taken by the department

- Skills in applying and using knowledge in a management position.

- Knowledge of vehicle legislation, automotive industry and trade practices.
- Experience and knowledge of modern business methods and financial control
- Extensive experience in all aspects of Supplier Relationship Management
- Willingness to travel and work in a global team of professionals

•	Maintain, validate, and monitor Risk Logs reported by Operational Risk Champions
•	Manage key relationship with business units
•	Nurture risk-aware culture of the whole bank
•	Perform tasks as assigned by Head of Risk Management and Compliance
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree in Finance and Banking or equivalent
•	3 years experience of risk management in banking industries  
•	Fluent in English
•	Good communication and interpersonal skill
Company Profile:
Canadia Bank Plc. was established on 11th November 1991 as “Canadia Gold & Trust Corporation Ltd.”, joint-venture between Cambodian - Canadians and the National Bank of Cambodia (Central Bank of Cambodia). The bank’s management consisted of former staff of the National Bank of Cambodia and its Cambodian – Canadian shareholders.

The main activities were based on gold transactions, gold plaque manufacturing and lending to local merchants. On 19th April 1993 the name was changed into CANADIA BANK LTD., licensed as a Commercial Bank with the National Bank of Cambodia and registered with the Ministry of Commerce. On 16th December 2003 the name of the bank changed into CANADIA BANK PLC. (Public Limited Company).

Since privatization in 1998 the Bank has become the largest local bank in Cambodia. With a worldwide network of correspondent banking relationships and a solid base of local and international customers CANADIA BANK PLC holds commanding market shares in loans as well as deposits. The bank offers a wide range of financial services through its Head Office and its more than 50 branches in Phnom Penh and major cities throughout the country.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
សាលារៀនខូលីងវូដភ្នំពេញ(CSPP) ជាសាលារៀនឯកជនដែលបណ្តុះបណ្តាលចំណេះដឹងទូទៅ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាពខ្ពស់បំផុតនៅកម្ពុជា។ បន្ទាប់ពីបានពិគ្រោះយោបល់ និងពិភាក្សាគ្នាអស់រយៈពេលជាច្រើនឆ្នាំ ដោយមានការចូលរួមពីអ្នកជំនាញផ្នែកអប់រំជាតិនិងអន្តរជាតិ បញ្ញវ័ន្តខ្មែរ និងសាស្រ្តាចារ្យដែលមានបទពិសោធន៍ខ្ពស់ក្នុងវិស័យអប់រំ សាលារៀន CSPP ត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងនៅឆ្នាំ២០១៧។

សាលារៀន CSPP បង្កើតឡើងដោយឈរលើកត្តាចម្បងពីរ ៖ (១)- លើកកម្ពស់ និងពង្រឹងកម្មវិធីសិក្សាចំណេះទូទៅខ្មែរ និង(២)- ចូលរួមចំណែកដល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលធនធានមនុស្សនៅកម្ពុជា ដោយកម្មវិធីសិក្សានៅ CSPP មានរួមបញ្ចូលនូវទស្សនៈនៃការអប់រំបែបទំនើប ដូចជាចំណេះដឹងបែបវិទ្យាសាស្រ្ត ការត្រិះរិះពិចារណាប្រកបដោយភាពវាងវៃ និងសមត្ថភាពភាសាបរទេស ជាពិសេសភាសាអង់គ្លេស ដើម្បីឱ្យស្របតាមសម័យកាលនៃសាកលភាវូបនីយកម្ម។ សាលារៀន CSPP ទទួលសិស្សចូលរៀន ចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី១ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី១២។

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន ៣០នាក់
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន ៣០នាក់
Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការ ការងារ ប្រចាំខែ ប្រចាំសបា្ដហ៍ 
-	ធ្វើផែនការ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ (សាច់ប្រាក់) ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំ សបា្ដហ៍
-	ធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ផលិតផល និង សេវាកម្ម របស់ស្ថាប័ន
-	វាយតំលៃអតិថិជន ដែលស្នើសុំខ្ចីប្រាក់, វាយតំលៃ មុខរបរ, ទ្រព្យសម្បត្ដិ និង ប្រភពសំណង ។
-	បំពេញ និង ត្រួតពិនិត្យ ឡើងវិញ នូវរាល់ឯកសារ ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងកម្ចី ដើម្បី អោយមាន ភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ និង មានសុពលភាព។
-	ធានាបាននូវការគោរពគោលការណ៍និតិវិធីនិង អនុវត្ដតាមការណែនាំ ផ្សេងៗរបស់ នាយក សាខា   និង  ការិយាល័យកណ្ដាល។
-	បើកប្រាក់កម្ចី និងប្រមូលប្រាក់កម្ចី 
-	ធ្វើការតាមដាន កម្ចី (ការប្រើប្រាស់, ស្ថានភាព មុខរបរ, ស្ថានភាពគ្រួសារ, ទ្រព្យធានា)។
-	សិក្សា ពី ស្ថានភាពឥណទាន និង ការប្រគួតប្រជែង ក្នុងតំបន់ ប្រតិបត្ដិការរបស់ខ្លួន
-	ដោះស្រាយ និង ជួយចូលរួមដោះស្រាយកម្ចីដែលមានបញ្ហា
Job Requirement:
លក្ខខ័ណ្ឌចាំបាច់ដែលត្រូវមាន៖
•មានឫគ្មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
•មានកំរិតវប្បធម៍ចាប់ពីថ្នាក់ទី១២ឡើងទៅ 
•មានជំនាញក្នុងការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មល្អ ទំ នាក់ទំនងល្អ និង ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា។
•មានសីលធម៌ល្អ អាកប្បកិរិយាល្អ ស្មោះ ត្រង់ ការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ មានការគោរព
វិន័យ និង មានគំនិតជាសហគ្រិន។
•ផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពោះបេក្ខជន ដែលរស់នៅ ក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក របស់ អង្គការឥណទានបៃតង ។
អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលទទួលបាន៖
១.ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជាប្រចាំទាំងខាងក្នុងនិងក្រៅស្ថាប័ន
២.ទទួលបានការវាយតំលៃតំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍ជារៀងរាល់ឆ្នាំ
៣.មានប្រាក់លើទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ, ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ០១ខែនៅរដូវចូលឆ្នាំនិងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ០១ខែនៅរដូវបុណ្យភ្ជុំ
៤.មានប្រាក់បំណាច់ឆ្នាំ, ធានារ៉ាប់រងលើសុខភាពនិងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ
៥.មានប្រាក់កម្ចីសំរាប់ការសិក្សារបស់បុគ្គលិកដោយមិនមានការប្រាក់

Company Profile:
Better Factories Cambodia is an innovative partnership program between the International Labour Organization (ILO) and the International Finance Corporation (IFC). It aims to improve labour standards and competitiveness in global supply chains. Better Work involves the development of both global tools and country level programs. The focus is on scalable and sustainable solutions which build cooperation between government, employers’ and workers’ organizations, and international buyers.

The program has three components:
1. Enterprise assessments on the compliance of the Cambodian labour law and core international labour
standards;
2. Enterprise advisory and training services designed to support practical improvements; and
3. Stakeholder engagement and sustainability.

For more information about the project see www.betterfactories.org
Better Factories Cambodia is part of the Better Work family which comprises similar programme in Vietnam, Indonesia, Jordan, Haiti, Nicaragua, Bangladesh, Ethiopia and Egypt (pilot).

For more information about Better Work, see: www.betterwork.org

Job Description:
JOB DESCRIPTION
The Assistant Digital Marketing Manager oversees the digital marketing strategy for the company and reports directly to the Digital Marketing Manager.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES 
•	Participate in devising strategies to drive online traffic to the company website.
•	Tracking conversion rates and making improvements to the website.
•	Developing and managing digital marketing campaigns
•	Utilizing a range of techniques including paid search, SEO and PPC.
•	Overseeing the social media strategy for the company.
•	Managing online brand and product campaigns to raise brand awareness.
•	Managing the design of the company website ensuring that the company remains at the forefront of its field.
•	Improving the usability, design, content and conversion of the company website
•	Responsibility for planning and budgetary control of all digital marketing
•	Evaluating customer research, market conditions and competitor data.
•	Review new technologies and keep the company at the forefront of developments in digital marketing.
Job Requirement:
QUALIFICATIONS & SKILL
•	Bachelor degree in Marketing.
•	Excellent Vietnamese language skills (Written & Spoken) 
•	Experience managing PPC, SEO and Affiliate programmes.
•	Experience in Vietnamese market in digital marketing is a definite plus (Optional) 
•	Strong understanding of current online marketing concepts, strategy and best practice.
•	Experience in ecommerce, SEO, PPC, Email marketing, and social media.
•	Previous experience in a similar digital marketing role.


Interested applicants may submit their CV to hr.mgr@creativeentertainmentltd.com.  Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   Phnom Penh Phnom Penh

Company Profile:
Mtrading is an international financial company with offices in 45 countries worldwide. Since the year 2001, Mtrading have provided clients with the most innovative trading technology on the global financial markets using the modern multifunctional trading platform Meta Trader 4. Being a part of a very dynamic industry.

We are always on the lookout to add new prospective members to our team. You can find more information about Mtrading here: kh.mtrading.com

We are currently expanding the coverage of our business to Cambodia and looking for suitable candidates to develop our sales in Cambodian market. 

We need people to handle the sales process of warm leads calling and closing sales. You will be calling to demo account traders, traders room users, forexball participants, real account applicants and other lists of potential clients worldwide to sell the idea of opening a real account, depositing and trading with Mtrading.

The superior service of Mtrading provide advanced solutions concerning currency internet-trading 

(FOREX Spot) and Contracts for Difference (CFD) for US stocks, indices and futures (crude oil & gas).

Our goal is to develop a mutually beneficial relationship in order to serve your clients at the highest professional 

level while offering competitive compensation packages and other rewards to you.

Job Description:
- Provide professional services for invoicing, credit control and debt collection whilst maintaining good customer relations.
- Build effective relationships to enhance the company’s business and statutory reputation within the local legal framework.
- Build relationship with external auditors and regulatory authorities.
- Liaise with others divisions to ensure that documentation submitted relating to accounts are adequate and that they are on time.
- Provide technical support on investment and financial analysis.
- Assist ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR in process improvements aligning with corporate strategies.
- Assist ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR in identifying and maintaining succession plans for all key finance positions.
- Provide financial input as required.
- Ensure that adequate financial policy framework is in place to guide financial decision-making by the top management (i.e. MD and ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR).
- Work closely with the Leadership Team (Operations Director and others department heads) as part of a mutually supportive, advising them on the likely financial consequences of all proposed courses of actions.
- Participate in key strategic development for the Company. Assist ACCOUNTING & FINANCE DIRECTOR in preparing annual budget and forecasts aligned to strategic plans.
- Prepare required detailed reports on financial matters.
- Maintain contact and liaise with investors/lenders/bankers, main customers/suppliers and auditors to ensure the long term financial security and stability of the Company.
- Implement financial controls in order to obtain accurate and complete financial information.
- Produce accurate financial reports to specific deadlines and interpret those reports.
- Ensure the monthly, quarterly and annual financial statements comply with local and international accounting standards.
- Manage a company's financial accounting, monitoring and reporting systems.
- Research and report on factors influencing financial performance.
- Conduct reviews and evaluations for cost-reduction opportunities.
- Ensure the finance processes comply with company standards and, where there are deviations, these are adequately substantiated.
- Ensure the approved policies and procedures are fully and correctly implemented and in compliance with company risk management procedures and appropriate
- Coverage for local risks.
- Work closely with other departments to do the forecast and predict future trends.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Finance/Accounting or equivalent.
- Professional accountancy qualification (CPA, CA or equivalent) (preferable).
- 3 - 5 year experience in a similar capacity as Accounting Manager.
- English communication skills, spoken & written.
- Software skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, QuickBooks, Peachtree, etc.).
- Analytical skills
- Able to travel to the province
Company Profile: HRINC is the leading provider of HR Services to the Cambodia market and expanding to the South East Asia region.  We support multinational companies and leading ASEAN conglomerates and SMEs with their Human Resource needs, from consulting and market intelligence, to outsourcing and compliance as well as recruitment.

Job Description:
I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
The Local Coordinator is responsible for implementing project activities at a regional and local level, overseeing project activities in at least 2-3 provinces. This position will include directly supervising local management and field officers who are providing education, livelihoods, awareness raising, and other interventions to combat child labor.

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
- Facilitate communication with regional and local authorities, local child-related committees, and regional offices of the Ministry of Labor, Education, and other national government agencies
- Coordinate activities with local sub-grantees or subcontractors
- Design consultations and raise awareness of child labor among local communities and design local child-labor plans
- Promote project sustainability and partnerships with the private sector and other organizations that work on child-labor related issues
- Coordinate with Education and Livelihood Specialists to provide technical training to field staff as needed
- Ensure timely implementation of project activities according to work-plans developed with project management
- Support implementation of M&E, including supervising field staff in monitoring service delivery and tracking impact on beneficiaries at the household and individual level
- Support manager in monitoring and evaluation of the project activities by regularly collecting data about the youth activities and its effectiveness

Company Profile:
About K.U.S Holdings

Founded in 1999, K.U.S Holdings specializes in the trading of steel bending components, formwork components and architectural works components.

To cater to the needs of different contractors for different type of projects in the market, K.U.S Holdings conducted in depth studies into the manufacturing process and the technical specifications of plywood. The range of plywood has since been expanded, and “Beaverply”, its own branding, was created.

With the added emphasis on efficiency and productivity of the construction industry in Singapore in recent years, K.U.S Holdings have invested into researching the different Formwork Systems globally, as part of the expansion plans to provide an alternative to the conventional formwork methods in the near future.

Over the years, K.U.S Holdings has established itself as an industry leader, and is committed to continue developing and suppling a wide range of products and services catering to the demand of growing construction markets and industries, while adjusting strategically in the evolving construction industry.

Company Profile:
Formally known as American Academy of Language and Art (AALA), ELT was founded by US entrepreneurs who strongly believed that education was a foundation in rebuilding the lives of Cambodian civilians. EESS is part of the ELT institution which offers many classes ranging from grades one to twelve. Students are given the opportunity to undertake studies in both Khmer and English which has been inspired by the learning and teaching standards of America. The Cambodian Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport recognizes the school’s commitment to education and has granted the rights for EESS to issue diplomas after meeting the credit requirements.

Due to students’ willingness and persistency in rebuilding their lives through education, the management team of ELT institution was able to introduce Cambodian International University in 2010. CamIU was established with the hope of providing students with Advanced Diploma, Intensive Diploma, Associate Degree, Bachelor’s Degree and Master Degrees that are widely recognized by the Cambodian Government.

between the buyers, sellers and appointed Property Management Company.

11. Evaluate mortgage options to help clients obtain financing at the best prevailing rates and terms.
12. Review property listings, trade journals, and relevant literature, and attend conventions, seminars, and staff and association meeting in order to remain 
knowledgeable about real estate markets.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
Reporting to Smart Shop Supervisor, the successful candidate will be responsible for:

- Welcoming customers

- Selling and changing SIM card

- Providing value added service to subscribers

- Handling customers’ complaints and requests

- Answering and recording customer inquiry

- Interfacing with other departments

- Following up with related department on pending complaints
Job Requirement:
- Good communication skills and ability to handle with strong complaints' customer

- Bachelor degree or Fourth year student in Management, Marketing or related field

- High level of experience in problem solving and willing to work under pressure

- High level in computer skills (Microsoft Office)

- Fluent Khmer and decent English both spoken and written
Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
- Assist Project Manager in day to day tasks and duties (check village lists and see for example if there are enough meetings planned to meet sales targets, update interested list, installation list, update demo administration, promotion contract administration, installation planning, etcetera)
- Contact Regional Sales Managers for daily/weekly reporting
- Ensure good relationship with all customers and business partners (e.g. MFIs. Installers)
- Analyze data to be able to advice Regional Sales Managers and Project Manager
- Prepare sales kit and training material
- In the near future conduct sales trainings independently
- After sales service
- 1 month after installation: conduct survey ‘buyers’
- Coordinate timely service visits (3, 9 and 19 months)
- Work closely together with Senior Accountant to make sure invoices are being send to MFI’s and installers on time.
- Work closely together with Project Coordinator Loan Assessments to update installation list.
- Translate marketing material and making sure material is finished on time
- Prepare weekly project updates within the company.
- Assist Sales Manager in serving customers in PP office (explaining products and handling sales)
- Provide sales staff in the field with MoonLights (arrange transport etcetera)
- Support in all remaining project related activities.
Job Requirement:
Personal Requirements:
- Bachelor degree, preferably in business, management or marketing
- Minimum of 2 years of experience as Project Assistant
- Good communication in English is essential
- Good computer skills
- Ability to establish priorities, work independently, solve problems
- Enthusiasm for the cause: solar energy for rural electrification
Special Requirements:
- Willing to work (limited) overtime occasionally
- Willing to travel and stay overnight in the province
- Drive motorbike

Our Offer: A good package will be offered. Start date: As soon as possible on a full-time basis. Probation period: 3 months. Working from Monday – Friday, 8 hours a day (40 hours a week), 18 days of Annual Leave, 20 Public Holiday, Opportunities to grow. A good training will be offered for successful candidates. We are an International Social Company experienced in Solar Energy. We have international Managers from The Netherlands and France and are willing to learn from each other. We are looking forward to having you as a team member!

Kamworks is Cambodia’s leading and most experiences Solar energy Company. We cover all area of Solar Electricity, and end users are focus in everything we do. ក្រុមហ៊ុន​ ហ្វុង ហ័ង ( Feng huang) កំសាន្តត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកអ្នកចែកបៀ តាមអ៊ិនធឺណែត (Dealer Online)

凤凰娱乐招聘高端网络荷官（牌手）

ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស អ្នកចែកបៀរ (Dealer) ច្រើន​នាក់៖  អ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍បានមានអាទិភាពអ្នកមិនទាន់មានបទពិសោធន៍​ បានផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល។

诚聘牌手多名：有经验优先，没有经验提供培训
Job Requirement:
តម្រូវការ៖  要求：

● បេក្ខនារី ត្រូវមានអាយុ ចាប់ពី 18 – 28 ឆ្នាំ មានរូបសម្បត្តិ ​ស្អាត សមរម្យ និង​​ រូសរាយ​​​ រាក់ទាក់​ ត្រូវមានកំពស់ចាប់ពី 1.58cm​ ឡើងទៅ​​ ។

● 女性19--28岁，美丽大方，气质优雅，身高1.58以上。

បញ្ជាក់៖  

បណ្តុះបណ្តា និង ការសាកល្បងរយៈពេល ១ ខែ ។  ប្រាក់ខែក្នុងកំឡុងពេល 250 ដុលា្ល បន្ទាប់ពីពេញសិទ្ឋិ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​សាកល្បងបានប្រាក់ខែ 300​ ដុលា្ល ។  ធ្វើការ​ប្រាំបួន​ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ ត្រូវការ​ផ្លាស់ប្តូរ​វេន សម្រាក​បួនថ្ងៃ​ក្នុងមួយខែ ។  អាចទទួលលុយថីព នៅក្នុងអំឡុងពេលប្រតិបត្ដិការ លុយថីពទាំងអស់ជាកម្មសិទ្ធិដោយ​អ្នកចែកបៀ ទាំងអស់​ ។ ​បរិភោគ និង ស្នាក់នៅលើ ក្រុមហ៊ុន បុគ្គលិក​ដែលប្រសើរ​ នឹងទទួលរង្វាន់ពីក្រុមហ៊ុននេះ ។

- 待遇：培训+试用期1个月，期间工资250元，转正后工资300，每天工作9小时，需要轮班，每月休息 4天。工作期间可收取小费，所收取小费全部归牌手所有。公司包吃住，表现突出者可获公司奖励。 

ទីតាំង​សំភាសន៍ ៖面试地点：

- ​​​ថ្ងៃ​ ទី​​ ៩ ដល់​​ ទី១១​ បីថ្ងៃជារៀងរាល់ខែ ថ្ងៃ​ ទី​៩ នាពេលម៉ោង ១ ថ្ងៃត្រង់ ​ដល់ ម៉ោង ៥ រសៀល ​ថ្ងៃ ទី១០​ និង ១១ នាពេលម៉ោង ៩​ព្រឹក ​ដល់ ម៉ោង ៥ រសៀល ​​ បេក្ខនារី យក​ប្រវត្តិរូប(CV) និង អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណមកសម្ភាសន៍​នៅ ក្នុងឡប់ប៊ីសណ្ឋាគារ ភ្នំពេញ ។ អាសយដ្ឋាន ៖ លេខ 53 មហាវិថីមុនីវង្ស សង្កាត់ ស្រះចក ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ។

- 每月9 - 11号3天在金边大酒店大厅，9号中午1点–下午5点，10号、11号早上9点 －下午5点 面试。地址：金边市莫尼旺大道门牌53号，隆边郡沙卓区。

- ឬមកសម្ភាសន៍នៅការិយាល័យផ្នែកOnline នៅជាន់ទី ៥ ក្នុងកស៊ីណូGood Luck ក្រុងបាវិត ។

- 或在柴桢省柬-越边境巴域市Good Luck Casino(好运娱乐赌场)5楼 519房面试。

job title: ជំនួយការហាងជួសជុលម៉ូតូ
position: ជំនួយការហាងជួសជុលម៉ូតូ
Job Description:
- គាំទ្រសិស្សដើម្បីត្រៀមខ្លូនក្នុងការទទួលបានការងារ ដោយបង្ហាត់បង្រៀនពីជំនាញនៃការជួសជុលម៉ូតូ
- ធានារក្សាឲ្យបាននូវទំនាក់ទំនង និងសេវាកម្មល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក ក៏ដូចជាគុណភាពនៃសម្ភារៈដែលបានទិញចូល
- រៀបចំធ្នើរ និងកន្លែងដាក់សម្ភារៈ 	
- រក្សារឲ្យបាននូវអនាម័យល្អនិងមានភាពទាក់ទាញនៅក្នុងហាងនិងបន្ទប់ ដាក់សម្ភារៈ 
- រៀបចំតារាងវិភាគការលក់ប្រចាំខែ
Job Requirement:
- យល់ដឹងពីរបៀបជួសជុលម៉ូតូ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារនៅក្នុងហាងជួសជុលម៉ូតូធំៗដូចជា ក្រុមហ៊ុន Honda រឺ Suzuki និងក្រុមហ៊ុនដទែទៀត (មានអាទិភាព)។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងខ្ពស់ទាំងសសេរនិងនិយាយជាភាសាខ្មែរ រួមទាំងភាសាអង់គ្លេសផងដែរ (បើសិនជាអាច) 
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំហាង ឲ្យមានសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ មានអនាម័យ និងមានភាពទាក់ទាញដល់អតិថិជន
- មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជាមួយអតិថិជនដោយភាពគួរសម និងទាក់ទាញពួកគេដើម្បីអញ្ញើញមក ម្ដងទៀត   
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យួទ័រ និងអ៊ីនធើណេត
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការរៀបចំស្តុក

ទីតាំងការងារ៖ ធ្វើការនៅក្រុងភ្នំពេញ និងក្រុងតាខ្មៅ
ថិរវេលាការងារ៖ ពេញម៉ោង

បេក្ខជនទាំងពីរភេទដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៏ សូមអញ្ជើញមកដាក់ពាក្យ ជាមួយនឹងប្រាក់ខែដែលរំពឹងទុក នៅទីស្នាក់ការអង្គការមិត្តសំឡាញ់ អាស័យដ្ឋានផ្ទះលេខ២១៥ ផ្លូវលេខ ១៣ (ខាងជើងសារៈមន្ទីរជាតិ) ឬ Email: hr@mithsamlanh.org  នូវតួនាទីជា ជំនួយការហាងជួសជុលម៉ូតូ ។

អង្គការមិត្តសំឡាញ់ ផ្តល់នូវភាពយុត្តិធម៌ដល់អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យទាំងអស់ ។ មានតែអ្នកដែលជ្រើសរើសសំរាំង ប៉ុណ្ណោះដែលនឹងត្រូវ ទូរស័ព្ទមកធ្វើការសម្ភាសន៍ ។ ស្ត្រីត្រូវផ្តល់អទិភាពក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យសុំបំរើការងារ ។

អង្គការមិត្តសំឡាញ់គោរពតាមគោលការណ៏ការពារកុមារ

ទទួលពាក្យចាប់ពីថ្ងៃជូនដំណឹងនេះរហូតដល់ថ្ងៃទី២៨ ខែធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០១៤

Job Description:
- Be part of Executive Management in strategy development and implementation process,
- Lead IT strategy and operational processes in a way that they align with HRINC’s business strategy to achieve overall HRINC’s goal by fostering innovation,
- Analyze the technology infrastructure and its alignment with business strategy.
- Develop and maintain appropriate IT structures to ensure a sustainable response to current and future business needs,
- Seek, evaluate and implement appropriate and cost effective investments in IT resources such as staffing, outsourcing, in-house development and purchasing,
- Ongoing Risk assessment and course correction on current and future IT systems and infrastructure,
- Develop, monitor and evaluate annual capital and operating budgets to ensure they are in line with HRINC’s business strategy,
- Assess and make suggestion on improvement or re-engineering of IT policies, process, infrastructure, security and other aspects of the IT infrastructure, hardware and software.
- Monitor, support and develop both internal IT resources as well as any external resources.
- Review hardware and software purchase and maintenance contracts and recommend the best options for approval.
- Establish or review IT policies and procedure including but not limited to Service level agreements with end users,
- Key Risk Indicators of each IT system in use,
- Business continuity planning,
- Recovery time objective,
- System security.
- Review and Monitor whole IT system and performance,
- Supervise recruitment, retention and development of staff to meet HRINC’s current and future needs.
Job Requirement:
- At least Bachelor’s Degree in computer science or Business administration or an equivalent qualification. Master degree in any of these fields is preferred.
- At least 7 years at a management level,
- Experience in strategic planning and execution,
- Ability to apply IT solutions to business challenges in a cost effective manner,
- Excellent in written and oral communication,
- Honesty, excellent interpersonal skill, strong negotiation skill and attention to detail,
- Strong ability to present idea in business friendly and user friendly language,
- Meticulous approach to analysis, evaluation and problem solving,
- Ability to motivate and create a collaborate environment,
- Ability to construct business models and write business plans with financial projections.
- Both Cambodian and Expatriate are encourage to apply

Job Description:
FINANCE & ACCOUNTING MANAGER POSITION

  Requirement:
  - Review Financial Report (BS, IC, CF & Supporting Report).
  - Monitor tax duty, work with tax officer for tax auditing.
  - Analyze and advise on business operations including revenue and expenditure trends, financial commitments and future revenues.
  - Prepare budget plan in Quarterly & yearly to manage cash flow for whole operation.
  - Organize financial management.
  - Management and oversight of the day-to-day financial transactions.
  - Control and update cost of product.
  - Review fixed asset.
  - Monitor revenue and expense.
  - Control age AR and account age AP.
  - Establish and monitor the implementation finance & accounting procedure.
  - Develop and maintain financial data bases.
  - Coordinate with internal/external auditors for auditing on financial report.
  - Develop financial/accounting form.
  - Train and manage financial/accounting team.
  - Participate in staff recruitment for finance/accounting department.
  - Monitor and evaluate the performance of finance and accounting staffs in Yearly. 


ACCOUNTANT POSITION
  Responsibility:
  - Prepare financial report (Balance sheet, Income statement, statement of cash flow, ...).
  - Update & follow up account age receivable & payable.
  - Cooperate with external auditor if the company’s financial is audited.
  - Prepare tax declaration.
  - Prepare payroll list.
  - Prepare depreciation of fixed asset list.
  - Record daily cash transaction in to cash book/bank book.
  - Prepare monthly cash/bank reconciliation sheet.
  - Prepare Monthly bank reconciliation sheet.
  - Prepare Payment Voucher, Receipt Voucher and Journal Voucher
  - Posting the transactions (revenue, expense, asset, stock, liability, capital) in to accounting system.
  - Check all vouchers are attached with its supporting doc. is made accord to company’s procedure.
  - Make adjustment the account’s transaction.
  - Assist other work assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
FINANCE & ACCOUNTING MANAGER

  Requirement:
  - Bachelor or Master Degree in financial & accounting for Management or other professional qualification from a recognized university or organization.
  - Knowledge of accepted accounting practices and principles
  - Knowledge of auditing practices and principles
  - Knowledge of applicable laws, and regulations
  - Must be proficient and experience with MS Excel and Word, QuickBooks, Peachtree or other accounting software.
  - At least 3 years experience in the management of financial systems and budgets, financial reporting, financial data analysis, auditing, taxation and providing financial advices.
  - Strong verbal and written English.
  - Ability to do multi-task, work under pressure, meet deadlines and thrive in a fast-paced work.
  - Strong communication, interpersonal and leadership skills
  - An ability to work as team member and to provide clear leadership and integrity.


ACCOUNTANT POSITION
  Requirement
  - Bachelor degree of accounting field or equivalent
  - Good at using QuickBooks, or Peachtree.
  - Good command of English for both speaking and writing.
  - Be honest and positive attitude.
  - Good interpersonal & communication skills, and be honest.
  - Good understanding of accounting standards
  - Understand the Tax law
  - Punctual and can be worked under pressure time.

Company Profile:
COGETEL Ltd. (ONLINE) is the leading ISP and broadband provider in the country; established in July 1997 by Telstra
Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department HR Manager 016672267 #60, Monivong BLvd, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh  016672267
