Job Description: Bayon Airlines will start flights in December!
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
巴戎航空倡导多元化的人力资源管理理念，提供国际化的薪酬福利待遇，努力为每一名员工提供广阔的个人发展空间。真诚地欢迎各位优秀的民航专业人士加盟巴戎航空，为发展柬埔寨民航运输业贡献自己的力量，在巴戎航空成就辉煌的人生理想！ 以下各部门岗位，诚招英才！欢迎您加盟巴戎航空！ 有意者请将求职信和个人简历(With Photo)发送至hr@bayonairlines.com 或将个人资料(With Photo)邮寄至柬埔寨巴戎航空公司。

Bayon Airlines advocates diverse Human Resources management concept. We provide standard salary and benefits, trying to provide opportunities for each employee for development. We sincerely welcome all interested candidates to join Bayon Airlines in order to make contribution to the development of Cambodia Civil Aviation industry as well as your own life achievement. Now we are recruiting staff for the following positions. Interested candidates please send your cover letter and resume (with photo) and send to hr@bayonairlines.com
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms.Karen  +855 23 5100 666 CEIB Building (Opposite of Attwood Business Center),La Russia Blvd, Khan Sensok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  +855 23 5100 666

	អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាង
	សមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោង
	ចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ថៃ ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ 
	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
	និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការិនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន ថៃ។
    1.	រយៈពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)
    2.	ចុុះឈ្មោះពិនិត្យសុខភាពចំណាយអស់​ 50ដុល្លារ
    3.	កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ
         -វេនព្រឹក      ម៉ោង8-11
         -វេនល្ងាច     ម៉ោង2-5
         -វេនយប់	ម៉ោង6-8
 លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស

-មានសុខភាពល្អ
-នៅលីវ

Job Description:
•	Site survey to study existing network and design the fiber optic schema in auto cad or other application.
•	Site survey to extend new backbone and FTTH network 
•	Calculate link loss budget
•	Preparing details drawing design of core ring or junction and access network by using AutoCAD or other software
•	Daily update existing design of fiber optic network
•	Deep analyzing to troubleshooting fiber optic issue
•	Working closely with OSP engineer and Installation to complete the project effectively.
•	Testing link by using OTDR, Power Meter to make sure link is quality and follow our design before deployment.
•	Preparing and keeping track of fiber optic core assignment report.
•	Ability to meet deadlines and work with others in a team environment
•	Searching new product or technology to improve our fiber optic network
•	Report to OSP manager
•	Leading and assigning OSP development team to complete assigned job.
•	Controlling hard and soft copy of design file
•	Other task assigned by line manager
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree of IT or relevant qualification
•	Computer Skill, Ms. Office, AutoCAD, Photoshop, Internet &E-mail 
•	At least 3 years working experience in fiber optic installation/outside plan or a similar role 
•	Strong team working skills
•	Good communication skills
•	Friendly and service minded
•	Written and spoken English 
•	Be able to travel to other provinces
Company Profile: HRINC is the leading provider of HR Services to the Cambodia market and expanding to the South East Asia region.  We support multinational companies and leading ASEAN conglomerates and SMEs with their Human Resource needs, from consulting and market intelligence, to outsourcing and compliance as well as recruitment.

ASIAN DEVELOPING ECONOMICS ORGANIZATION   (CAMBODIA)

	-ពិគ្រោះនិង ជួយសំរបសំរួលការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាដើម្ប

	សិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេស
	ការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ!

	អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាង

	ចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ថៃ ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ 
	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
	និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការិនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន ថៃ។

    3.	កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ

Job Description:

2. Generate and review financial statements: AP/GL/BL/P&L.
3. Process daily sales and payables.
4. Perform license and permit renewals.
5. Tax submissions.
6. Process staff payroll.
7. Conduct Month-End/ Year-End Close.
8. Perform other management tasks as necessary.
Job Requirement:
0.1*** HIGH ACHIEVERS ONLY ***
0.2 Honesty is everything.

1. University degree in accounting/ finance.
2. Related accounting experience in Fast food/hospitality/restaurant or bakery for 2 years.
3. Good command of English.
4. Excellent computer skills and proficient in MS Office.

Job Description:
1.Manage all F&B and day-to-day operations based on SOPs. Including:
1-1 Monitor food & beverage services and quality on a regular basis to meet standards
1-2 Provide excellent customer service.
2. Train and on-going development of team members. 
3. Staff scheduling/ Staff performance Evaluation.
Job Requirement:
0.1*** HIGH ACHIEVERS ONLY ***
0.2 Honesty is everything

1. Customer-Service: Food and beverage managers have to interact with customers. Being friendly and courteous will help keep customers coming back. Proven English ability is a plus.
2. Speaking Skills: Food and beverage managers need to accurately and easily communicate standards and cooking methods to staff, give orders and speak with customers clearly.
3. Problem-Solving Skills: Dealing with employee conflict, irate customers and wrong stock orders is part of a food and beverage manager's job. Being able to come up with a solution quickly is a needed skill.
4. Leadership: Food and beverage managers must be leaders in the back of house, rallying their team during heavy shifts, resolving conflicts and getting the job done.
5. Experience in fast food/hospitality/restaurant or bakery at least 1 year.
Contact Info: Contact Information Howard Lin  010 333 243 / 023 695 6888 #53, St.446, Toultompoung1, Khan Chamkamorn, PP  010 333 243 / 023 695 6888

Company Profile:

job title: HOT: Marketing Manager of Mobile App
position: HOT: Marketing Manager of Mobile App
Job Description:
Our fast growing international company is hiring an energetic Sales and Marketing Manager for Cambodia's #1 e-commerce app and website FanNow. FanNow is the first movie ticket purchase app in Cambodia. In addition to movie tickets, users can also buy phone top-up, deals and join events. 

Pathmazing is a global software solution provider in pursuit of extraordinary mobile application and web solutions. We are the developers of FanNow, the first movie ticket and deal purchase app in Cambodia. Our hard-working team of nearly 40 IT professionals reside in offices located in the United States, Malaysia and Cambodia -- serving clients worldwide around the clock. Our Cambodian office is located on the top floor of the Bayon Center with a beautiful view of the city skyline, including Canadia Tower and Vatannac Tower.
Job Requirement:
- Everyday user of mobile apps and websites
- Strong leadership skill
- Strong interpersonal skill
- Strong oral and written English communications. Other languages are a big plus. 

For consideration, please send your CV to jobs@pathmazing.com. Benefits include generous salary, profit sharing and potential ownership in the company.

Join Pathmazing today — Cambodia's #1 IT outsourcing firm. 

Cambodia's leading software solutions provider is seeking business development managers, project managers and business analysts to join our world-class team. With over 130 IT talents working on exciting international projects, Pathmazing is providing solutions to clients globally, and deploying our own commercial apps. International clients include eBay, Tesla and Coca-cola, and locally, Cellcard, Chip Mong Group and Sathapana Bank. 	វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាកពិសេស!
	សិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេស
	ការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ!

	អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាង
	សមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោង
	ចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ថៃ ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ 
	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
	និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការិនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន ថៃ។
    1.	រយៈពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)

         -វេនព្រឹក      ម៉ោង8-11
         -វេនល្ងាច     ម៉ោង2-5
         -វេនយប់	ម៉ោង6-8
 លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស

-មានសុខភាពល្អ

-ជាពលរដ្ឋខែ្មរ មានអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ័ និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ

Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

- Customer Service Officer is serves customers by providing product (Housing) information and resolving (Housing) problems.

2. Duties & responsibilities:

- Attracts potential customers by answering product (Housing) questions; suggesting information about other products (Housing).

- Maintains customer records by updating files information.

- Resolves product (Housing) problems by clarifying the customer's complaint; determining the cause of the problem; selecting and explaining the best solution to solve the problem; expediting correction or adjustment; following up to ensure resolution.

- Recommends potential products (Housing) to management by collecting customer information and analyzing customer needs.

- Prepares product (Housing) reports by collecting and analyzing customer information.

- Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Job Requirement:
3. Qualification & requirement:

- A bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a similar skill.
- 1 or more years of work experience of real estate/private Company.
- Good speak and writing of the English & other language 
- Computer literacy especially MS Office
- Good Communication
- Good Problem Solving
- Good Documentation Skills

4. Working Days and Hours

- Monday to Saturday: 	8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 		12:00pm to 1:00pm

5. Work place

- Customer Service Officer is based in Site/Branch, the department of Marketing and Sales

5. Relationship

- Customer Service Officer works under supervise & report directly to Marketing and Sales

6. Salary and Benefit

- Salary (Negotiation)
- Lunch
- Uniform 
- 13rd months’ salary
- 100% - 300% annual incentive

Job Description:
What You Will Do

Do you want to use your technical and management skills and bring them to the next level? Our Operations team is responsible for delivering 100,000 inspections, audits and lab tests per year. If you deeply believe that customer satisfaction must always come first, we would love to hear from you!

As an AI Quality Inspector, you will represent AI clients by going to their supplier factory/warehouse to perform quality inspections and reporting product quality in a timely and accurate manner. You will play an important role for our clients in ensuring the quality of their supply chain.

Your Responsibilities :
•	Conduct product quality inspections on site based on the industry requirements and the company practices. The inspection includes but is not limited to: visual inspection, functional test, packaging check, etc. 
•	Report product quality against the checklist and reference sample provided by the company. 
•	Prepare and submit inspection reports within the timeframe.
Job Requirement:
The Skills We’re Looking For

•	Technical diploma or higher degree in engineering OR more than 5 years experience in a 3rd party QC company.  
•	Familiar with AQL standard and good knowledge of safety and regulation standards.
•	Good command of written & oral English.

Our Values
At AI, our values guide our actions and interactions with one another. 'Clients First', 'Integrity' and 'Simplicity' are 3 of the 8 values our employees share. Please read more at http://www.asiainspection.com/corporate-values and make sure you share these values before applying.

What We Offer
We are a fast growing company and our wealth is our people. We provide benefits that take care of you including attractive compensation packages that reward performance. At AI, find the opportunity to really make an impact and grow in a fast-paced and multicultural work environment!

Job Description:
1.Scope of working:

- Recruitment Officer interviews applicants to determine their job requirements and suitability for particular jobs, assess their training needs and help employers to find suitable staff.

2.Duties & responsibilities:

- Interview people looking for work, and record relevant personal and work details to match them with appropriate jobs.
- Receive and record job vacancy information from employers
- Organise advertising, interviewing and selection processes for recruitment campaigns
- Interview job seekers and prepare shortlists of candidates for referral to prospective employers
- Check references and suitability of applicants before referring to employers
- Prepare resumes and correspondence for suitable applicants to forward to employers
- Arrange appropriate training in job skills
- Observe jobs to obtain information about job requirements
- Prepare job descriptions and letters of appointment
- Prepare rosters and duty statements, as well as organise security passes and identification.
- Others duty assign by management.


3. Working Days and Hours
- Monday to Saturday: 	8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 		12:00pm to 1:00pm

4. Work place
- Recruitment Officer is based in Head Office, the department of HR and Admin. of Borey Peng Huoth

5. Relationship
- Recruitment Officer works under supervise & report directly to HR and Administration Vice Director/Director

6. Salary and Benefit
- Salary (Negotiation)
- Lunch
- Uniform 
- 13rd months’ salary
- 100% - 300% annual incentive

Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

- The Graphic Designer produce visual communications, including art and layouts of text for reproduction in print and electronic media such as magazines, newspapers, books and websites, as well as image designs for corporate identity sale programs, exhibitions and advertising.

2. Duties & responsibilities:

- Develop and design 'roughs' (sketches) based on superior requirements
- Prepare comprehensive layouts of the design using techniques such as photography, illustration and computer-generated imagery
- Identify communication problems and develop visual solutions
- Present and propose designs to manager for approval
- Prepare designs for print or digital publication and signage
- Design and set up exhibitions for advertising purposes
- Supervise all design production stages, including arranging and supervising printing.
- Maintain all other related graphic design works, and perform other tasks assign by direct manager.


3. Working Days and Hours

- Monday to Saturday: 8:00am to 12:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm
- Lunch time: 12:00pm to 1:00pm

4. Work place

- Graphic Designer is based in Head Office of Borey Peng Huoth.

5.Salary and Benefit

- Salary (Negotiation)
- Lunch
- Uniform
- 13rd months’ salary
- 100% - 300% annual incentive
Job Requirement:
6. Qualification & requirement:

- Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Marketing and other relevant fields;
- At least 1+ year work experience of similar position in real estate/private Company.
- Able to use design program such as Adobe Series (Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign…), Corel Draw, AutoCAD.
- Good oral and written English and Khmer communication skills;
- Able to work under pressure to meet deadlines and attention to detail accuracy;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, integrity and willing to work as a team.
- Creative and imaginative
- Understanding of colour and form
- Good marketing abilities

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Job Description:

- Perform regular inventory checks on all products including in-store and back-of-
store and maintain stock records for reordering

- Perform general administrative duties when required
- Assist with promotional activities for Tonlé

Job Description:
Our client is an International School in Cambodia. Currently, We are seeking dynamic and dedicated candidates to join our teams of professionals in the position of Architectural. 

+ Responsibilities :
- Operate computer-aided drafting (CAD) equipment, working drawings, charts, forms and records.
- Coordinate structural, electrical and mechanical designs 
- Draw rough and detailed scale plans for foundations, buildings and structures, based on preliminary concepts, sketches, specification sheets and 
other data.
- Lay out and plan interior room arrangements for commercial buildings using computer-assisted drafting (CAD) equipment and software.
- Obtain and assemble data to complete architectural designs, visiting job sites to compile measurements as necessary.
- Check dimensions of materials to be used and assign numbers to lists of materials.
- Analyze technical implications of architect's design concept, calculating weights, volumes.
- Reproduce drawings on copy machines or trace copies of plans and drawings using transparent paper or cloth, ink, pencil, and standard drafting 
instruments.
- Prepare colored drawings of landscape and interior designs 
- Build landscape, architectural and display models.	

+ Requirements:
- A bachelor's degree in architecture. Courses typically include computer graphics and technology, and design
- More than 5 years experience with related work
- Computer-literate, expert with operating CAD programs, entering data, preparing reports and setting up functions.
-PC Skills : Word / Excel / Outlook / PowerPoint

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary : $ 800 - $
- Working Day : Monday - Saturday
- Working Time :8:00 am-12:00 am | 1:00 pm-5:00 pm
- Holiday : Sat (Half) / Sun / Legal holiday
- 24 Insurance
- Medical Expend 100$
- Staff Evaluation (If you have performance well then you will get more ½ to 2 month of salary).

Company Profile:
Formally known as American Academy of Language and Art (AALA), ELT was founded by US entrepreneurs who strongly believed that education was a foundation in rebuilding the lives of Cambodian civilians. EESS is part of the ELT institution which offers many classes ranging from grades one to twelve. Students are given the opportunity to undertake studies in both Khmer and English which has been inspired by the learning and teaching standards of America. The Cambodian Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport recognizes the school’s commitment to education and has granted the rights for EESS to issue diplomas after meeting the credit requirements.

Due to students’ willingness and persistency in rebuilding their lives through education, the management team of ELT institution was able to introduce Cambodian International University in 2010. CamIU was established with the hope of providing students with Advanced Diploma, Intensive Diploma, Associate Degree, Bachelor’s Degree and Master Degrees that are widely recognized by the Cambodian Government. 

Over the years, ELT institution has made tremendous progress. In the beginning of 2010, there were 375 registered staff members and 5850 enrolled students. The prestigious reputation of ELT Group continues to grow and will do so through the strong leadership of its management team.

Company Profile:
COGETEL Ltd. (ONLINE) is the leading ISP and broadband provider in the country; established in July 1997 by Telstra
Cambodia as Bigpond Cambodia – the first commercial Internet Service Provider in the country. In 2002, Cogetel Limited acquired the business from Telstra marking the beginning of its ADSL service and its new brand name – ONLINE.

ONLINE subsequently brought in WiMAX, Long-range WiFi, and Fiber Optic to increase its range of last miles technology to meet any need of its customers.

ONLINE strives to deliver products and services that are tailored to its customers’ Internet technology needs, easily understood and used, delivered with warmth, knowledge and experience throughout the years. Supported by its core drive of keeping people in touch with their world; ONLINE always brings innovative products and services to Cambodia, thus keeping Cambodia abreast with latest technologies worldwide.

Our uniquely tailored services continue to meet the needs of diverse customers – whether for domestic, corporate, single or multiple users, academic or leisure purposes. Online improves communications with the rest of the world through ideal, reliable and secure connection coupled with excellent support services. ONLINE is connected to the world directly through mainland China, Hong Kong, Thailand, European countries, through redundant fiber optic cable making us the most vigorous ISP in Cambodia with abundant and diverse routes around the world.

Our Mission
To deliver technology solutions to achieve superior operational performance that enables us to provide our customers with exceptional service.

Our Vision
To be the primary internet service provider of choice and ideal company that provides fostering work environment.

Job Description:
- Aroy Innovation develops proprietary software for mobile and web. We own all the products we develop. We do not do contract work for clients. 

- We develop proprietary digital media solutions that deliver brand engagement on mobile and web. 

- Also, our digital media properties will never track, collect, store or analyze personal identity data, helping brands and their clientele build a more trusted connection.

Job Requirements

- Must be able to work independently, creative, innovative and can meet deadlines.

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន(Credit Officer)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន(Credit Officer)
Job Description:
- 	ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចី គោរពតាមគោលការណ៍ នីតិវិធីរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។
- 	ស្វែងយល់ពីបរិយាកាសគូរប្រកួតប្រជែង និងធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល និង សេវាកម្មរបស់ស្ថាប័ន  ។
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ រួមមានការងារផ្សព្វផ្សាយការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន និងការប្រមូលឥណទានត្រឡប់មកវិញ ។
- គ្រប់គ្រងសាច់ប្រាក់ក្នុងការដឹកជញ្ជូនប្រាក់ ការបើកប្រាក់ និងប្រមូលប្រាក់ពី អតិថិជនអោយស្របតាមគោលការណ៍របស់ស្ថាប័ន  ។
- រៀបចំបូកសរុបកិច្ចការឥណទានជូនប្រធានដើម្បីពិនិត្យភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ​ និង អនុម័ត នៅពេលសម្រេចផ្តល់ឥណទាន ។
- 	ធ្វើការទំនាក់ទំនងសាធារណៈនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ  និងថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បតិ្តរបស់ស្ថាប័នអោយបានគង់វង្ស ។
Job Requirement:
- មានសញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រ បរិញ្ញាបត្ររង ឫ ទុតិយភូមិ
-​ 	ជានិស្សិតកំពុងសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ ( ឆ្នាំទី៤, ៣, ២, ឬ ទី១ ) ឯកទេសពាណិជ្ជកម្មសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ឫជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។ជំនាញ ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ឫសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ ។
- ជាមនុស្សមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ សុភាពរាបសារមានភាព ឈ្លាស វៃ និងទិសដៅអាជីពត្រឹមត្រូវ ។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មល្អ ការ ទំនាក់ទំនងល្អការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និង ចេះធ្វើការសម្រេចចិត្ត ។
- ផ្តល់អាទិភាពបេក្ខជន ដែលរស់នៅក្នុង តំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកខាង លើរបស់វិវឌ្ឍន៍ ។

បេក្ខជន ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ ត្រូវដាក់ពាក្យសុំជាមួយ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធមានដូចជា ប្រវត្តិរូបភ្ជាប់ជាមួយ រូបថត ៤ x ៦ (០១សន្លឹក) ប័ណ្ណ គ្រួសារ សំបុត្រកំណើត អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រផ្សេងៗ (ថតចំលងតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ)   មកកាន់ទីស្នាក់ការកណ្តាលភ្នំពេញ ដែលមានអាស័យដ្ឋាន ផ្ទះលេខ៦៥៩ ផ្លូវលេខ ៣៧១ ភូមិឫស្សី សង្កាត់ស្ទឹងមានជ័យ ខណ្ឌមានជ័យ រាជាធានីភ្នំពេញ ឬនៅការិយាល័យ វិវឌ្ឍន៍ណាមួយដែលនៅជិតលោក ។  ហើយមានតែបេក្ខជនដែលត្រូវអញ្ជើញធ្វើការប្រឡង ឬបទសម្ភាសន៍នឹងត្រូវ បានទំនាក់ទំនងតាមទូរស័ព្ទ ។ បេក្ខជនក៏អាចផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូប និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈ E-mail : venvothy.vivat@gmail.com

Job Description:
Our business partner is the only authorized distributor of CDN lighting product in Cambodia. Currently, We are seeking for  dynamic, dedicated and potential candidates to fulfill the position of Architect & Design Manager.
+ Responsibilities :
- Playing a part in project and team management. 
Working closely with a team of other professional such as building service engineers, construction managers, quantity surveyors and architectural technologies. 
- Adapting plans according to circumstances and resolving any related problems that may arise during construction 
- Making sure the project is running according to schedule and budget 
- Travelling regularly to building sites, proposed locations and client meetings
- Setting out, leveling and surveying the site
- Checking plans, drawings and quantities for accuracy of calculations
- Ensuring that all materials used and work performed are as per specifications 
- Attending regular meetings to keep them informed of progress
Overseeing quality control, health and safety matters on site 
- Actively monitor the work environment for hazard 
- Resolving any unexpected technical difficulties and other problems that may arise 
- Checking progressive activity at the site
-To execute tasks using computer software such as Microsoft Office, Microsoft Project, Auto CAD Architecture, 3D Studio MAX, Sketch up Pro.V-Ray Plug
- In and Adobe Creative Suites such as Photoshop, Illustrator and In Design.
-To coordinate with Design Director, Production Director, and Engineering Director in developing project plans such as project feasibility, financial, marketing materials, master planning design, scheduling and technical expertise
- To coordinate with contractors to execute the project according to standards of design and technical requirements

+ Requirements:
- BA/MBA Degree a MUST in Architecture or Engineering, Construction Management or Construction Science from an internationally recognized university.
- At least 6-8 years’ experience as site engineer
Master Degree in Architecture or Engineering, Construction Management or Construction Science from an internationally recognized university.
- Experience in draw up detailed design for site works and the coordination with building workers
- Strong Management skill & Creative 
- Hard working, mature, pro
- Active, result-oriented, honest and good interpersonal skill 
- Must be able to lead a team on projects. Experience with Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Project). 
- Highly organized, flexible and initiative 
- Very good command of written and spoken English and Khmer 
- Able to travel to province for work at site

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary : $ 1000 - $ 1500
- Working Day : Monday - Saturday 
- Working Time: 8:00 Am- 17:00 PM
- Holiday : Sun / Legal holiday

Job Description:
•	To lead in the developing, formulating and implementing of sales and marketing strategic initiatives and operational procedures to achieve short term and long term business objectives.
•	To lead and supervise the sales team to achieve the annual and monthly sales targets.
•	To lead in the formulating of  marketing budget and the preparation of sales report to Top Management on a weekly, monthly, and yearly basis.
•	To maintain rapport and closed relationship with our business partners, and proactively identify and capture new business opportunities.
•	To coordinate with different parties including logistics, customer relationship, and sales and distribution team to ensure excellent customer services.
•	To lead the marketing team to develop and implement marketing and promotional programs and activities to support the operations of the business.
•	To acquire and collect market information including competitor movement to help prepare and formulate sales forecasts, budgets and analysis reports.
•	To ensure long term sustainability and scalable business development, you are tasked with the leadership to initiate people management of the team to up-skill and develop their abilities to meet with the business objectives of the company.
•	To perform other ad-hoc assignments and projects as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•	Degree holder in Business Administration or equivalent,  with a MBA will be  advantageous 
•	At least 15 years' business development and sales management experience with at least 8 years at managerial level,  preferably gained from sizable organizations in food, beverage or FMCG industries
•	Extensive experience in developing, expanding and managing distributors and wholesalers network for the relevant businesses
•	Proven track records in managing sizable business with exposure in the ASEAN markets will be a plus
•	High level of business acumen, result-oriented, organized and self-motivated
•	Excellent leadership, communications and people management skills
•	Strategic planning and staff development skills are essential
•	Proficiency in spoken and written English, knowledge of other Asian languages a bonus
•	Sound knowledge of MS office application.

Successful candidate will be offered competitive conditions of employment and the opportunity to work in a dynamic and rewarding environment alongside colleagues from diverse cultural setting.

Job Description:
• Direct report to the VP who oversees the finance and accounting functions of the Group
• To take particular responsibility for regular group level reporting, budgeting & forecasting, financial analysis and strategic planning.
• To take the lead in the designing and implementing governance and risk management frameworks from strategic to operational levels.
• To take the lead in initiating change management activities and significant involvement in ad hoc projects as required
• To lead the professional team to oversee system implementation, review policies and procedures, develop and review internal control systems to enhance good governance and to improve efficiency
• To ensure internal controls are sufficient to maintain all levels of compliance, and to give recommendations for improvement and corrective measure where necessary.
• Developing and maintaining good external relationships with auditors, bankers, solicitors, tax authorities and related government bodies for banking, taxation, customs and related issues.
• Build and maintain a high performance finance team by providing strong leadership and guidance
• To enhance management reporting including financial andaccounting, auditing, cost control, business performancebudgeting,cash flow, statutory reporting, and tax planning in a professional and timely manner.
• Analyze financial performance of various profit centers and monitor their results against budget and KPIs
• To provide professional advice and tax planning to top management
• To collaborate with senior management to proactively understand the business needs and drive IT team for technology solutions to improve business efficiency
Job Requirement:
• Degree holder in finance or accounting, a qualified accountant, and preferably with professional qualification such as ACCA or CPA or the equivalent
• Has to demonstrate successful experience gained from sizable organizations with a minimum of 10 years of relevant working experience in a leading finance role of which 5 years at managerial level in a fast paced and innovative environment
• With the ability to manage people, motivate and drive change in an organization
• Excellent interpersonal and communication skills and the ability to collaborate with management at all levels
• Proficiency in MS Suite, experience in system enhancement, and familiar with SAP ERP system will be an added advantage
• Excellent analytical skills and problem solving skills, and able to work under pressure
• Proficiency in English is required with Cambodian language or other Asian language a bonus

Job Description:

Job Description:
• Supervise sales admininistrative activities of real estate projects
• Prepare all necessary agreements with house buyers, including Sale-Purchase Agreement, Installment Agreement etc.
• Help the Company to achieve short and long term business growth.
• Work closely with other divisions of Sales & Marketing Department and Finance Department.
• Do monthly report on number of agreements.
• Performs other duties as assigned from the top management.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor Degree in Business Administration, Banking & Finance, or in Law.
• At least 2-3 year experience in Real Estate Sector.
• Have keen analytical mind and entrepreneurship skill. Able to focus on core issues and develop sales strategies.
• Knowledge and understanding of the industry, competitor movements, and customers’ value chain and business practices to exploit all available business opportunities.
• Skill in examining and reengineering operations and procedures, formulating policy, and impacts, and/or projections
• Excellent communicator who can handle difficult business situations well.
• Ability to demonstrate energy, sense of urgency, focus and follow through that deliver high quality results.
• Good command of English, written and spoken; and computer literate.

We offer competitive remuneration and fringe benefits including meal, insurance, pension, child allowance, and annual leave, as well as excellent career development opportunities in our exciting environment to the right candidate.

Interested parties are invited to send their CV and cover letter, and a current 4x6 photo, stating current and expected salary, to hr@chipmonggroup.com or our address at P.O. Box 137, 137B, Mao Tse Toung Blvd., Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Please note that only shortlisted candidate will be contacted for interview.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  017 593 222 P.O Box 137, #137B, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia.  017 593 222

Job Description:
Our client is the only authorized distributor of CDN lighting product in Cambodia.Currently, we are looking for the potential candidate to fulfill the position Stock Controller.[940]

+ Responsibilities :
- Managing daily stock
- Receive stock and Prepare stock in with PI, CI & PL comparison report
- Make a summary list for stock loss
- Perform physical stock count every 2 weeks and close stock at the end of the month
- Monitor transferred stock to warehouse
- Prepare daily / weekly/ monthly Stock report
- Arrange and deliver products to customer
- Support sales & accounting team
- Handle all materials in stock properly and quality safety
- Ensure all products in stock properly arranged order, monitored and counted
- Perform and ensure document are properly filed and managed
- Perform other tasks assigned by manager

+ Requirements:
- Bachelor Degree
- At least 2 years’ experience in Stock controller,
- Male only
- Friendly, hardworking and flexibility
- Self-confidence and motivation
- Good communication skill
- Negotiation skills
- Willing to learn new thing
- Good team work and time management
- Able to work under pressure
- Good writing and speaking English knowledge
-Chinese knowledge is advantage
- Proficient with Microsoft Office

+ Conditions and benefits:
- Salary : $ 200 - $ 400
- Working Day : Monday - Saturday
- Working Time: 8:00 Am-17:00 PM
- Holiday : Sun /Legal holiday
- Salary negotiation 
- Other benefit plus

Job Description:
•	Coordinate a staff training program based on organizational and employee needs
•	Use questionnaires and surveys in consultation with Line-managers and staff to analyze training needs as they relate to the goals of the organization and work area.
•	Develop training resources, which may involve preparing notes and visual displays from researched information or their own knowledge.
•	Arrange or conduct training courses, which may involve demonstrating equipment, operating video recorders and cameras, leading group discussions or role-playing activities and employing experts to run sessions.
•	Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs using surveys, questionnaires, interviews and observation, in order to plan future courses or to adjust existing ones
•	Prepare, administer and conduct training assessments.
•	Provide career development sessions for existing staff and conduct induction sessions for new CMC’s employees. 
•	Assist in developing training interventions to meet the needs of internal and external stakeholders. 
•	Support learners during training interventions.
•	Maintain learner outcomes in a Learning Management System.
•	Working in a team to produce programs that are satisfactory to all relevant parties in an organization, such as line managers and senior managers at board level. 
•	Devising organization learning plans. 
•	Keeping up to date with developments in training by reading relevant journals or researching, going to meetings and attending relevant courses.
•	Researching new technologies and methodologies in workplace learning and presenting this research.
•	All other tasks will assigned by Training and Organization Development Supervisor.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Business Management, Human Resource Management, English literature or relevant filed.
•	1 or 2 years’ experience in training and development.
•	Excellent in English both of spoken and written.
•	Excellent in computer basic skills, Microsoft Office Word, Excels, and Power Point.

Job Description:
• To ensure the delivery of exceptional operational and commercial standards throughout stores and drive sales and profitability through the performance and development of store personnel, whilst managing within agreed budgets. 
• To do this by maximizing time in units and minimizing time at head office.
Job Requirement:
1.To complete store operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results.
2.To maintain store staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees.
3.To maintain store staff job results by coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
4.To identify current and future customer requirements by establishing rapport with potential and actual customers and other persons in a position to understand service requirements.
5.To protect employees and customers by providing a safe and clean store environment.
6.To maintain operations by initiating, coordinating, and enforcing program, operational, and personnel policies and procedures.
7.To contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
8.To support the management of customer service activities and staff competence so as to optimize and sustain sales performance and customer satisfaction,
9.To clearly and concisely communicate business and Area objectives to managers so that they remain well informed of business activity and of their required contribution to targets, 
10.To achieve stock control targets in line with company guidelines to prevent financial loss,
11.To liaise with the Buying and Merchandising teams regarding the supply of stock in the store to maximize stock potential,
12.To identify under performing stores and develop a business plan to address and manage issues effectively,
13.To collate and provide constructive feedback on VM standards to the business,
14.To ensure that the visual presentation of all stores represents the brand image,
15.To support the delivery of all marketing campaigns,
16.To effectively manage the performance and development of store personnel to drive and maximize the sale performance throughout the shop
17.To plan for succession of the shop through the identification of individuals with potential for development and growth,

Company Profile:
GIZ is a federally owned enterprise and is supporting the German Government in achieving its objectives in the field of international cooperation for sustainable development. 

For our Social Health Protection Programme (SHPP), we are seeking for a candidate for the position of Junior Advisor for Health Service Delivery (national professional), based in Kampong Thom.

The Cambodian - German Social Health Protection Programme provides technical and financial assistance to the Ministry of Health and other institutions within the framework of the Health Sector Strategic Plan of the Ministry of Health (MoH) and Provincial Health Department (PHD) in Kampong Thom, Kampot and Kep province. The overall objective of the joint programme of German Development Cooperation and the Ministry of Health is that the poor and vulnerable population in Cambodia is healthier and faces less financial burden by using quality health care services.

The health services delivery (HSD) interventions focus on strengthening quality improvement mechanisms within the Cambodian health system by assisting the Ministry of Health to develop policy documents and guidelines for better quality in health care at national and provincial level. The Junior Advisor for HSD will work under the supervision of provincial health manager for coordinating and providing technical advice to counterparts for systematic implementation of quality improvement measures at provincial and health facilities.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Sineth Heang HR Manager  No. 17, Street 306, P.O. Box 81, Phnom Penh

job title: Customer Relation & Credit Control Officer - CR&CC
position: Customer Relation & Credit Control Officer - CR&CC
Job Description:
•	Call to customer to ask for payment.
•	Control daily money collection report (Collection Sheet).
•	Total the incoming money per day and report to assistant of supervisor.
•	Assign salesmen and collectors to make an appointment with customers or to collect money by their schedule.
•	Request for statement issuing for collectors and salesmen to AR.
•	Request for credit memo to AR.
•	Call to customers and follow up in case there is problem and solve that problem.
•	Follow up with collector for COD invoices
•	Analyze  and control credit limit and credit term of customers
•	Reply for customer balance as requested by salesman 
•	Call to salesman to report some information and problems.
•	Run report for salesman
•	Complete bank statement (Name of customer, ID, Number of invoice, Name of salesman)
•	Follow up the remaining amount of money in bank statement to find out which customer has deposited that amount.
•	Check bank statement if it completed or not yet and keep it in the file.
•	Follow up and confirmation about installment payment for Borei Chipmong flat.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree holder in Finance/Accounting or related field
•	Financial and Accounting skill is  must
•	At least 1 year experience in related field
•	Good communication skill and problem solving
•	Proficiency in Microsoft word and Excel
•	Good communication in English both spoken and written
•	Willing to work under pressure, flexible environment 
•	Good Knowledge of Microsoft office Application



We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including year-end double pay, meal, insurance, pension, child allowance, and annual leave, as well as excellent career development opportunities in our exciting environment to the right candidate.

Interested parties, please apply with your full resume with covering letter and a current 4x6 photo, stating current and expected salary, send to our address at P.O. Box 137, 137B, Mao Tse Toung Blvd., Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia, Email : hr@chipmonggroup.com  or Tel: 017 593 222.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  017 593 222 P.O Box 137, #137B, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia.  017 593 222

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

position: មន្រី្តឥណទាន Credit Officer
Location: Kampong Speu，Kampong Thom，Kampot，Kandal，Kep，Phnom Penh，Preah Sihanouk，Siem Reap，Takeo
Job Description:
- រៀបចំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ផែនការសកម្មភាពដោយអនុលោមតាមគោលការណ៍ និងនីតិវធីឥណទានរបស់សាមិកដែលបានដាក់ជូនពីថ្នាក់លើ។
- រៀបចំផែនការការងារប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ ឲ្យបានទៀងទាត់ តាមពេលវេលាសមរម្យ ជាមូយ រួមទាំងផែនការប្រមូលប្រាក់ ទំលាក់ទុនឥណទានពីប្រធានសាខាស្រុក។
- ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារប្រតិបតិ្តការជាមួយប្រធានសាខាស្រុក ក្នុងការរៀបចំផែនការចលនាសាច់ប្រាក់ប្រចាំត្រីមាស និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់សាមិក ដល់អតិថិជនគោលដៅក្នុងតំបន់មានសក្តានុពល និង គ្រប់គ្រងរក្សាផលប័ត្រកម្ជី និងចំនួនអតិថិជនប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់។
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន ដូចជា ប្រធានភូមិ មេឃុំ ប្រធាននគរបាលនិងប្រតិបត្តិករឥណទានដទៃទៀតក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ។
- 	វាយតម្លៃឥណទានតាមការស្នើសុំរបស់អតិថិជនគោលដៅប្របកដោយ ប្រសិទ្ធិភាព និងជំនាញខ្ពស់ ស្របតាមគោលការណ៍ នីតិវិធីឥណទាន និងសេចក្តីណែនាំរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
- រៀបចំធើ្វឯកសារគ្រប់គ្រងប្រាក់កម្ជី និងដាក់ជូនប្រធានសាខាស្រុកដើម្បី អនុម័តមុនពេលបើកលុយជូនអតិថិជន។
- រៀបចំធើ្វផែនការប្រមូលប្រាក់ និងទំលាក់ទុនឥណទាន ដែលអនុម័តចាត់តាំងដោយ ប្រធានសាខាស្រុក តាមពេលកំណត់ច្បាស់លាស់។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យលើការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រាក់ឥណទានរបស់អតិថិជន និងចាត់វិធានការបន្ទាន់ នៅពេលមានបញ្ហាអតិថិជនបង់ប្រាក់យឺតយ៉ាវ និងរាយការណ៍អំពីស្ថានភាពនៃការដោះស្រាយដល់ប្រធានសាខាស្រុក។
- ចេះធ្វើការសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវអំពីសេចក្តីពេញចិត្តរបស់អតិថិជន និងការវិភាគលើ ភាពខ្លាំងខ្សោយ របស់គូប្រជែងក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការរបស់ខ្លួន តាមពេលវេលាសមរម្យ។
- ចេះលើកទឹកចិត្ត និងបង្កើនសមាជិកភាពឲ្យកាន់តែច្រើន ឡើងៗតាមរយៈការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអតិថិជន ដើម្បីបង្កើនភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងភាពជឿរជាក់។
- ទទួលការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធចាត់តាំងដោយប្រធានសាខាស្រុក
Job Requirement:
- ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ធនាគារ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ទីផ្សារ ឬប្រហាក់ប្រហែល (យ៉ាងតិចត្រឹមឆ្នាំទី៣) 
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ច្រើនពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារ
- ចេះនិយាយ និងប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានល្អ
- មានចរិតស្លូតបូត សុភាពរាបសា និងមានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
- តស៊ូព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ ពិសេសចេះប្រឈមនឹងសំពាធការងារ
- មានចំណេះដឹងផែ្នកប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងគណនី
- ខិតខំធើ្វការងារ និងចេះលើកទឹកចិត្តខ្លួនឯង
- មានឆន្ទៈខ្ពស់ក្នុងការទទួលយកការងារថ្មីៗ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ 

ព័ត៌មានទំនាក់ទំនង ៖
បេក្ខជនដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ អាចដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលធ្វើការដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូប សង្ខេបមានបិទរូបថត ៤ X ៦ ចំនួន ០១ ច្បាប់ នៅសាខាណាមួយ នៃគ្រឹះស្ថានមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាមិក ដែលនៅ ជិតលោកអ្នក ឬទំនាក់ទំនងតាមអ៊ីមែល career@samic.com.kh និងទូរស័ព្ទលេខ ០១២ ៣១១ ៧៥៧/០២៣ ៩៩៨ ២២៦ ។
•	ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យសុំចូលបំរើការងារត្រឹមថ្ងៃទី ៣១ ខែមករា ឆ្នាំ ២០១៥ វេលាម៉ោង ០៥ រសៀល។
•	ស្រ្តី និងជនពិការត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត

Job Description:
•	Be the expert on the enterprise segment
•	Use customer, market and commercial insights to develop customer-centric value propositions
•	Develop Go-To-Market strategies and marketing plans
•	Analyse, research and  regular direct customer contact to generate quality insights about the segment
•	Work with the insights as well as critical stakeholders in the business to develop new and update existing segment-centric value propositions, product bundles, and promotions for enterprise customers
•	Develop segment-relevant partner marketing initiatives
•	Monitor and track performance of the products after launch. Liaise with internal departments to collate monthly reports and compiling weekly statistics on product performance
•	Monitor segment performance against targets and against competition
•	Build business case, including owned, earned, paid media and prepare A&P budget for campaign
Job Requirement:
•	Degree in Marketing Management or related fields
•	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing or related field. Master of Business Administration / Marketing preferred
•	Strong knowledge of marketing principles, practices, tactics and tools and customer insights in specific industry or customer segments
•	At lease 2 years experience within a marketing role 
•	Affinity with  commercial knowledge of Telecom and technology market is a plus
•	Be a team player, flexible, determined, and creative to get the job done
•	Excellent interpersonal skills, with ability to inspire, lead, and influence people across the organisation
•	English proficient
•	Computer literate

We support multinational companies and leading ASEAN conglomerates and SMEs with their Human Resource needs, from consulting and market intelligence, to outsourcing and compliance as well as recruitment.

Job Description:
• Leads daily/month CMC inspections and participate in audits and assessment as necessary
• Involve in daily incidents investigation as they occur and lead as appropriate
• Company or contract vehicles in regular service, ensures drivers conduct daily, weekly and monthly inspection on vehicles legal requirement
• Compiles and submits information as required for monthly reporting of HSE performance
• Maintains local Emergency Response Plans to cover oil spills, fires, medical, operational  incidents, along with other safety and security plans as necessary
• Provides operational HSE support for all activities associated with the permitting and day  to day operation of the office and plant base
• Implements health, safety and environment plans, programs, and procedure
• Implements internal HSE Management System to ensure compliance
• Enforces Health, Safety and Environment policies and procedures for compliance with CMC and HSE system and best practice communication to workforce
• Ensures that required PPE is to be used during working hours
• Conducts or arranges HSE training and induction for new employees, visitors and contractors
• Identifies HSE training CMC personnel (including  contractors)
• Implement and train CMC personnel on various HSE plans and programs
• Conducts inspection and audit on third party contractors and company's assets.
Job Requirement:
. Degree holder with major in Management
. Should obtained of any HSE/Safety certificate
. At least two years of working experience or other related fields
. Familiarity with industrial operations and HSE issues
. Occasionally required to work long hours, especially during emergency response situations
. Be able to travel to site/province occasionally for training or inspections
. MS Office using.

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including year-end double pay, meal, insurance, pension, child allowance, and annual leave, as well as excellent career development opportunities in our exciting environment to the right candidate.

Interested parties, please apply with your full resume with cover letter and a current 4x6 photo, stating current and expected salary, to hr@chipmonggroup.com or our address at P.O. Box 137, 137B, Mao Tse Toung Blvd., Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia,
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
A visit to the wonders of Angkor, will have you ready to discover more of the charm of the Khmer culture. The richness of its cuisine, is waiting to be explored, and we offer the best traditional restaurants in the area. 

While discovering the different parts of the Old Market along the narrow walkways, arouse your senses at the food market. Don't miss the vibrant colors of the local products; discover new fruits and vegetables which will guarantee supurb photographs. If you wish to end your trip in the heart of the Khmer culture, savour the finesse of its cuisine within the best traditional restaurants, 5 minutes away from the Psar Chas (Old Market).

The AMOK offers a family style Khmer cuisine, whilst the KHMER BBQ and the CAMBODIAN BBQ offer the popular dish Phnom Pleung (literally fire mountain) with a choice of ostrich, crocodile, kangaroo and much more. In order to appreciate the full richness of fine Khmer cuisine, CHAMPEY welcomes you with a cosy and hearty atmosphere with full A/C on 1st floor. Or if you want to refresh yourself, head to BANANA LEAF and enjoy original branded cocktails, homemade ice-cream, a large selection of tapas and the original Croc-Burger.

Want to go away from busy streets and keep discover more cosy settings? If you are heading to or from the temples, stop off at THE KHMER BAR BE Q and enjoy the nightly Apsara and Dancing Show, along with a Khmer Discovery Menu. And for a special evening out, on our suggested Khmer food journey, appreciate the privileged atmosphere of MADAME BUTTERFLY, a restaurant serving a fine dining standard of local cuisine, in a Traditional Wooden House surrounded by a lovely garden scene.

Crossing over the old market brige will take you to the newly built King's Road Angkor Village. King's road Angkor is the home of world class restaurants, cafes and exclusive shopping boutiques, while offering an authentic modern vision of a traditional Khmer wooden village.

THE GREY KHMER GRILL provides an upper market
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resources Department HR Manager +855-95 488 513 Angkor W, Old Market Siem Reap, Cambodia  +855-95 488 513

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Phuong Panha  078 817 333 No.36, St.169, PPIU Building, 4th Floor, Veal Vong, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Cambodia   078 817 333

Job Description:
To enter data into daily  reports into the BV Lab/BV NG system and client website system of the Company
a) Enter the information from the TRF to BV Lab
b) Check the report format from each Client Program from CPSDoc
c) Clarify with the technician or report checker for any unclear information regarding the test results received
d) Adjust the requirement, under the guidance method of the Report Reviewer
e) Check the basic information on TRF: style number, color name, care label and other mandatory information in accordance with samples received and client requirement
f) Coordinate with the Test Assignment team for all the test parameters to be posted in the system
g) Check the date based on TRF Hold On / Off hold form and image files on server
h) Check to ensure that the results entered in the system is accurate and complete
i) Ensure that the soft copy of the reports are saved in the correct folder

Job Description:
1.	Study both Bureau Veritas & Client’ inspection requirements to ensure full understanding before job execution. 
2.	Execute the job(s) assigned by Manager.
3.	Perform inspections, sample collection, container loading and other services in accordance with SOP, protocols, and client’s SOP.

7.	Participate any sort of training courses conducted by company or clients as required.
8.	Perform on-site assessment for the team.
9.	Stricly follow BVCPS Code of Ethics, Code of Conduct and related requirements as provided.

10.	Perform other suitable duties as assigned by Manager

Job Description:
វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុន​ជាកម្មសិក្សាការី​!
១-​រយះពេល១ឆ្នាំ/៣​ឆ្នាំ/​៥ឆ្នាំ
២-ក្រោមគំរោងសហការរវាងរាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជានិងរាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលជប៉ុន
៣-ក្រោម​ការគ្រប់គ្រង របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនមានអាជ្ញាបណ្ណ័បញ្ជូនកម្មសិក្សាការី និងអង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល សហប្រតិបត្តិការអន្តរជាតិជប៉ុន(Jitco)
៤-គោលបំណង ៖សិក្សាជំនាញបច្ចេកទេសការងារ យកបទពិសោធន៍ កសាងស្មារតីការងារ និងសិក្សាភាសាជប៉ុន ដើម្បីបានក្លាយជាធនធានមនុស្ស
មានគុណភាព និងសក្កដានុពល។
៥-​​ ក្រោយពេលបញ្ចប់វគ្គ កម្មសិក្សាការីក្លាយជាធនធានជំនាញការងារ មានក្រេឌីត បានវិញ្ញាបណ្ណបត្រ័ និងចេះភាសាជប៉ុន និងបានប្រាក់សល់ពី
20000-30000ដុល្លារទៀតផង។

ហត្ថាយ៉ប/HATHA JOB ជាមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលធនធានមនុស្ស ផ្តល់ការពិគ្រោះ ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ជួយស្វែងរក និងជួយផ្លាស់ប្តូរការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាជិត១០ហើយ។ មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលក៏ជាទីកន្លែងជួយស្វែងរការងារនិងផ្គត់ផ្គង់បុគ្គលិកជូនក្រុមហ៊ុនដៃគូ។ បច្ចុប្បន្ននៅតែជាកន្លែងជួយស្វែងរកនិងជួយផ្លាស់ប្តូរការងារជូនប្រជាជនដើម្បីទទួលបាន ការងារតាមការពេញចិត្ត លើសពីនេះក៏មានបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនូវភាសាការងារនិងជំនាញការងារមួយចំនួនដើម្បីជួយយុវជន នារីទទួលបានការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ​។
            +++++++++++++++++++++
Hatha Job ឱកាសការងារជាប្រចាំសំរាប់លោកអ្នកជ្រើសរើសនិងផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ៖
1- គ្រប់គ្រងការងារផ្ទះ/Home careមានអាហារស្នាក់ 200$-300$
2- សេវាកម្មហាង ភោជនីយដ្ឋានមានអាហារស្នាក់ 150$-200$
3- ទីផ្សារ/លក់ 300$- 1000$
4- រដ្ឋបាល/គណនេយ្យជំនាញ200$-1000$
5- ជាងជំនាញ(ដែក អ៊ីណុក កញ្ចក់ ឈើ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ សំណង់ ភ្លើង
 ដេរសំលៀកបំពាក់...300$- 800$ 
6-អ្នកជំនាញមាន ចុងភៅ ពេទ្យ វិស្វករ ស្ថាបត្យករ.. 300$-800$
7- កម្មករទូទៅ $170- $230
8- គ្រូបង្រៀន/អ្នកបកប្រែ ៖ ភាសាខ្មែរ អង់គ្លេស ចិន ជប៉ុន....200$-700$
9- អ្នកបើកបរ(ក្បាល2, 3 ,4 ,5,) $200- $300
10- អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង (supervisor​​ to manager ) $350- $2000
Hatha Job ទទួលបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដោយមិនបង់ប្រាក់នូវជំនាញការងារដូចជា
កូនជាងបច្ចេកទេស(ដែក អ៊ីណុក កញ្ចក់ ឈើ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ សំណង់ ភ្លើង ..គណនេយ្យហាត់ការ និងរដ្ឋបាលហាត់ការ (ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ)

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន និង ទីផ្សារ (Credit & Marketing Officer)
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន និង ទីផ្សារ (Credit & Marketing Officer)
Job Description:
តួនាទីនិងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
• ចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផលឥណទានរបស់អង្គការអនន្ត និងបង្ហាញអោយអតិថិជនប្រើប្រាស់ចំគោលដៅ
• ចុះអងេ្កតវិភាគ និងវាយតំលៃឥណទានដល់ទីលំនៅដ្ឋានរបស់អតិថិជន
• តាមដានលើការសងត្រឡប់មកវិញរបស់អតិថិជនជាប្រចាំសប្តាហ៏ ឬ ប្រចាំខែ
• ចុះដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាលើឥណទានដែលសងមិនទៀងទាត់
• ការផ្តល់ឥណទានប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៏សកម្មភាពប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៏ ប្រចាំខែ និងរាយការណ៏ជូនទៅប្រធានសាខា
• មានទំនាកទំនងល្អជាមួយសាធារណ:ជន អតិថិជនសក្តានុពល និងអាជ្ញាធរ រួមទាំងថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
Job Requirement:
លក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិនៃបេក្ខជន 
• ភេទប្រុស ឬ ស្រី មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 25 ឆ្នាំ
• មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងតិចចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២
• មានបទពិសោធន៏យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំ 
• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និង មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ
• មានសុខភាពល្អ និង កាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
• មានឆន្ឆ:ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារនៅតាមមូលដ្ឋាន និង មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
• ត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យួទ័រ Ms Word, Ms Excel
• ភាសាអង់គ្លេសអាចប្រើការបាន
• ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន
• ផ្តល់អតិភាព ចំពោះនិស្សិតទើបប្រលងជាប់
• ផ្តល់អតិភាព ចំពោះបេក្ខជនស្គាល់ភូមិសាស្រ្ត ខណ្ឌសែនសុខ និង ខណ្ឌឬស្សីកែវ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms.Kanha Administration Manager 077 727 484 / 096 980 9266 Phnom Penh  077 727 484 / 096 980 9266

Job Description:
Our Clients (You will work at):

It began in Cambodia in May 2012. It has teamed up with the most famous Japanese Motorcycle company to provide financial services. Based on this partnership, it can support the purchase of brand-new motorcycles. With presence in 44 outlets all around Cambodia.

The Parent company is in Singapore and has 20 years’ experience in leasing motorcycles in Thailand, Bangkok-based Company has set a long-term business plan to become a leading finance company in the Southeast Asian region.


Job Description:
Underwriting Supervisor is acting as a professional advisor to Underwriting Manager on all aspects of underwriting department’s implementation in order to ensure that the department functions effectively in connection to increasing the right approval of financial lease applications and improving the operation more efficiently 

Duty and Responsibility:
> Train and coach, especially lead Senior Underwriters and Underwriters, based on their required tasks, to build up their capacity for financial lease analysis and to ensure they are complying with the company's policy
> Identify and assess internal and external issues which will affect underwriting department by conducting a regular meeting with senior underwriters to receive their report and the problems, and a solution with Underwriting Manager
> Assist Underwriting Manager in implementing overall underwriting tasks towards the speed, the quantity and the quality of financial lease approvals.
> Develop and update manual, procedure, policy, guideline of underwriting department by working closely with Underwriting Manager
> Conduct staff performance appraisal, and recommend improvement and development to staff members
> Recruit, interview and select new Underwriters with the manager
> Make and send reports of underwriting department to all managers or relevant parties
> Perform other tasks as required by the manager


Benefit:
> Salary is $300-500.
> Valuable experience in the rapid-growing Financial company with high-skilled, very talented developer team.
Job Requirement:
> Required relevant experience at least 3 years
> At least Bachelor Degree in Finance, Banking, or other related fields
> Understanding in Micro-Finance, Banking, Credit 
> Proficiency in English language (Speaking, Writing and Listening)
> Be honest, team work, and good communication skill
> Computer knowledge (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Internet & Email.

If you are interested, please send us your resume.

It has been around 40 years since it is built in Japan. It is the most famous wigs manufacturer in Japan, and it will open the new factory at PPSEZ. It is new factory, new team, and will be 2,000 employees-large-scale. It seeks for high-motivated, challenge-oriented, qualified managers.

Job Description:

HR Training Supervisor
> Liaising with managers and interviewing employees at all levels to identify and assess training and development needs
> Delivering/overseeing the delivery of training to individuals or groups of employees
> Compiling and presenting information
> Implementing, advising about and monitoring appraisal schemes
> Supervising and monitoring progress made via training programmes or schemes
> Ensuring employees receive statutory required training

Recruitment Supervisor
> Recruit, train and manage 1,000-2,000 workers
> Prepare CV of candidate and document for the interview
> Responsible for recruitment and staff selection
> Prepare Standard Operation Procedure (“SOP”), Employment Contract and Scope of Work (SOW) for all staffs
> Prepare monthly payroll for all staffs
> Dealing with all issues related to staff benefit, safety, conflict
> Deal, organize, manage all issues of the administrative works

- Experience of Japanese standard production and quality

Job Description:
The Recruitment Manager manages the end-to-end recruitment cycle for our resorts, develops a talent pipeline, works with the business to forecast headcount plans and develops succession plans across the company. When necessary the Recruitment Manager works with the Human Resources Manager to review all recruitment related policies and procedures. Ultimately, the Recruitment Manager takes responsibility for developing the recruitment function into a business-aligned, value add function.

Key Responsibilities:

- Designs, develops and maintains the recruitment process in the organization (including its description, recruitment measurement definitions, regular measurement reporting, taking proper actions to close gaps)
- Designs the selection matrix for choosing the optimum recruitment channel and recruitment source
- Monitors and constantly reduces the costs of the recruitment process
- Monitors the labor legislation and implements required changes to keep the process compliant
- Acts as a single point of contact for Heads of Departments regarding recruitment topics
- Coordinates and implements college recruiting initiatives
- Designs training recruitment for relevant managers
Job Requirement:
Requirements:

- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Job Interviewing Skills
- Managerial and leadership skills
- Analytical skills
- Social Media Knowledge
- Outstanding organization skills
- Training skills
- Interest in people career development
- Ability to work on your own initiative
- Ability to work under pressure
- Ability to define and build talent acquisition process and strategy
- Knowledge of Cambodian employment legislation
Contact Info: Contact Information Sophai YOENG  855 15 337 222 / 855 63 969 300  National Road 6, Siem Reap, Cambodia  855 15 337 222 / 855 63 969 300

Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is a commercial bank established since a decade in South East Asia. The bank identified a strong business opportunity to open a new branch in Laos.
The Chief Executive Officer will report directly to the Chairman and the Board of Directors. He will be in charge to open and establish the new branch and be responsible to provide strategic leadership and to establish long-range goals, strategies, plans, and policies.

Main Duties and responsibilities
Business Strategy:
•	Establish links between the Bank’ corporate vision, corporate strategy and banking and fiduciary initiatives;
•	Develop and execute a strategy to strengthen the Bank’business;
•	Ensure the customer service deliveryconsistent with strong financial results.
General Management:
•	Oversee the overall coordination of business activities to achieve objectives of growth and to ensure the effectiveness of the market share, retention and operational processes;
•	Translate strategy into business, product and service plans to enhance optimal impact on other business lines;
•	Maintain operational compliance with company and industry policies, procedures and regulations;
•	Supervise all administration, regulatory compliance, risk management, liquidity management, capital management and financial management.
Team Leadership and People Development:
•	Build and develop talent to drive the future success of the Bank, creating strength at all levels that will meet current and future needs;
•	Recruit, hire and develop people to prepare for contribution to the business;
•	Foster and create an environment that supports development of diverse teams.
Collaboration:
•	Develop partnership with banking colleagues and functional specialists across the organization to deliver an integrated business model, develop and enhance client loyalty and position the business for continued growth.
Governance:
•	Maintain and manage effective relationships with the Board of Directors, other banking industry leaders, and with key external constituencies including the central bank (Bank of Laos), trade associations, government representatives, staff of regulatory organizations, and the media.
•	Ensure that the Board of Directors is provided with timely reports and information in support of their fiduciary and corporate governance responsibilities.
•	Actively participate in all meetings of the Board of Directors and Board committee meetings.

Reporting
•	To the Chairman and the Board of Directors
Company Profile: We are professionals in HR and MANAGEMENT CONSULTING based in Cambodia and engaged across South East Asia. We maximise the EFFICIENCY and the PRODUCTIVITY of YOUR ORGANIZATION.
Contact Info: Contact Information Saint Blanquat & A.  +855235445005 21, street 214, Phnom Penh, Cambodia  +855235445005

Job Description:
Summary of position
Our client is one of the leading international company specialized in supporting companies in expanding their businesses in existing markets and launching into new ones.
The company is currently seeking for the qualified candidate for the position of Trade Marketing Manager. 
The Trade Marketing Manager will be in charge of working closely with supplier and proposing marketing plan. He/she will roll out strategic markets, manage & monitor Trade spend among other duties and responsibilities.

Main Duties and responsibilities	
•	Give Strategic direction to the team to optimize the overall productivity and performance.
•	As a Profit Centre Head, review and set Budget i.e., volume, market share & revenue targets.
•	Liaison with Manufacturing, Marketing and Finance to set sales goals and budgets to meet and exceed Sales revenue and profitability targets.
•	Provide leadership and direction to a multi functional team including Sales, Marketing, Customer Service Delivery and Corporate Affairs with profit centre and budget responsibilities.
•	Plan and implement strategies on product positioning, new market development, channel segmentation, sales mix and pack sizes in order to augment business . Identify and penetrate new market segments and exceed profit margins.
•	Analyze price positions and recommends most appropriate pricing changes, assessing the impact on results in turn driving profitability.
•	Provides input to marketing based on observations and customer feedback.
•	Ensure effective liaison with state Governments and functionaries

Reporting
•	To the Group Trade Marketing and Communication Manager
Job Requirement:
•	Master/Bachelor degree in marketing or other relevant field,
•	At least 10 years experiences in related marketing/brand management with FMCG,
•	A top notch Sales and Marketing professional with sound business and commercial acumen and P&L orientation in multicultural environment
•	Results oriented and self-driven,
•	A charismatic leader with impeccable execution capabilities and people skills who can lead the marketing team to the next level of growth challenges.
•	Strong interpersonal skills are crucial to create partnerships at senior levels across the group.
•	Strong mature and decision making ability.
•	Excellent analytical, presentation skills and negotiation, and communication skill,
•	Fluent in English, both oral and written.
Company Profile: We are professionals in HR and MANAGEMENT CONSULTING based in Cambodia and engaged across South East Asia. We maximise the EFFICIENCY and the PRODUCTIVITY of YOUR ORGANIZATION.

ហត្ថាយ៉ប/HATHA JOB ជាមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលធនធានមនុស្ស ផ្តល់ការពិគ្រោះ ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ជួយស្វែងរក និងជួយផ្លាស់ប្តូរការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាជិត១០ហើយ។ មជ្ឈមណ្ឌលក៏ជាទីកន្លែងជួយស្វែងរការងារនិងផ្គត់ផ្គង់បុគ្គលិកជូនក្រុមហ៊ុនដៃគូ។ បច្ចុប្បន្ននៅតែជាកន្លែងជួយស្វែងរកនិងជួយផ្លាស់ប្តូរការងារជូនប្រជាជនដើម្បីទទួលបាន ការងារតាមការពេញចិត្ត លើសពីនេះក៏មានបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនូវភាសាការងារនិងជំនាញការងារមួយចំនួនដើម្បីជួយយុវជន នារីទទួលបានការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ ប្រាក់ខែសមរម្យ​។
            +++++++++++++++++++++
Hatha Job ឱកាសការងារជាប្រចាំសំរាប់លោកអ្នកជ្រើសរើសនិងផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ៖
1- គ្រប់គ្រងការងារផ្ទះ/Home careមានអាហារស្នាក់ 200$-300$
2- សេវាកម្មហាង ភោជនីយដ្ឋានមានអាហារស្នាក់ 150$-200$
3- ទីផ្សារ/លក់ 300$- 1000$
4- រដ្ឋបាល/គណនេយ្យជំនាញ200$-1000$
5- ជាងជំនាញ(ដែក អ៊ីណុក កញ្ចក់ ឈើ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ សំណង់ ភ្លើង
 ដេរសំលៀកបំពាក់...300$- 800$ 
6-អ្នកជំនាញមាន ចុងភៅ ពេទ្យ វិស្វករ ស្ថាបត្យករ.. 300$-800$
7- កម្មករទូទៅ $170- $230
8- គ្រូបង្រៀន/អ្នកបកប្រែ ៖ ភាសាខ្មែរ អង់គ្លេស ចិន ជប៉ុន....200$-700$
9- អ្នកបើកបរ(ក្បាល2, 3 ,4 ,5,) $200- $300
10- អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង (supervisor​​ to manager ) $350- $2000
Hatha Job ទទួលបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដោយមិនបង់ប្រាក់នូវជំនាញការងារដូចជា
កូនជាងបច្ចេកទេស(ដែក អ៊ីណុក កញ្ចក់ ឈើ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ សំណង់ ភ្លើង ..គណនេយ្យហាត់ការ និងរដ្ឋបាលហាត់ការ (ទទួលបានប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ)
ទំនាក់ទំនងព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម ៖ 023 691 6761 អ៊ីម៉ែល hathajob@yahoo.com

company_name: អង្គការអភិវឌ្ឍសេដ្ឋកិច្ចអាស៊ាន ( A.D.E )
Company Profile:
ASIAN DEVELOPING ECONOMICS ORGANIZATION   (CAMBODIA)

	-ជាទីប្រជុំក្រុមហ្រ៊ុនចំរុះជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក កម្មករ
	-ពិគ្រោះនិង ជួយសំរបសំរួលការងារជូនប្រជាជនកម្ពុជាដើម្ប
	ទទួលបានឱកាសការងារត្រឹមត្រូវ សមរម្យ និងឆាប់រហ័ស
	-ពិគ្រោះនិងបណ្តុះបណ្តាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើការនៅកម្ពុជា អាស៊ាន ជប៉ុន
-អង្គការយើងខ្ញុំមានលក់ កុំព្យូទ័រ ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រូជាក់ ប្រូចេចទ័រ ស្លាយបញ្ចាំ សូមទំនាក់ទំនងលេខទូរស័ព្ទៈ 096/097 8084 909
	វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាកពិសេស!
	សិក្សាការងារដើម្បីធ្វើជាកម្មសិក្សាបណ្តុះបណ្តាបច្ចេកទេស
	ការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុនរយៈពេល៣ឆ្នាំ/ប្រាក់ខែ1500-2500ដុល្លារ!

	អង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារក្នុងស្រុកនិងក្រៅស្រុកកសាង
	សមត្ដភាពការងារ និងស្មារតីការងារដើម្បីជួយពលរដ្ឋកម្ពុជាឈោង
	ចាប់ឱកាសការងារ អាស៊ាននិងជប៉ុន ថៃ ។ មានបើកវគ្គពិសេសគឺ 
	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារនិងភាសាដើម្បីជួយដល់ យុវជន យុវនារី សិស្ស
	និស្សិត កម្មករ កម្មការិនី បានទៅសិក្សានិងធ្វើការប្រទេសជប៉ុន ថៃ។
    1.	រយៈពេលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល( 1-3ខែ)
    2.	ចុុះឈ្មោះពិនិត្យសុខភាពចំណាយអស់​ 50ដុល្លារ
    3.	កម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តោះ
         -វេនព្រឹក      ម៉ោង8-11
         -វេនល្ងាច     ម៉ោង2-5
         -វេនយប់	ម៉ោង6-8
 លក្ខ័ខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស
-អាយុ 20 -30 ឆ្នាំ
-មានសុខភាពល្អ
-នៅលីវ
-ជាពលរដ្ឋខែ្មរ មានអត្តសញ្ញាណបណ្ណ័ និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារ
