Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555 No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh  017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555

Company Profile:
The Company
The East-West Seed Group is an Asian based Privately owned Global leader in the tropical vegetable seeds business.  Using advanced breeding technologies, East-West Seed creates value for farmers by producing Better Seeds for Better Yield.  The company’s strategy is based on breeding locally adapted varieties that allow farmers to be more productive, increase their income and profits - thereby contributing to agricultural sustainability.  East-West seeds are planted in the fields of over 30 million farmers worldwide, with 200 billion seeds sold yearly. The company is Asia-based, but with global operations primarily in the tropical zone.  It employs 4,700 employees globally and maintain 15 R&D stations in 7 countries.  It  lives and work in the markets that it  serve.  To learn more about EWS please visit www.eastwestseed.com

Job Description:
Summary of Position
Our client is a Property Development Company specialized in developing and managing
condominium apartments in Phnom Penh for local and international customers. The
Housekeeping and Maintenance Supervisor will be in responsible for ensuring the
standards of cleanliness, hygiene and tidiness are maintained throughout the property
and to manage the housekeeping and maintenance departments efficiently.

Main Duties and Responsibilities
• Manage the daily activities of the Housekeeping /Maintenance department to
include appropriate cleaning of all common areas, as well as apartments which have
contracted cleaning.
• Complete all required training and schedule and train all new department staff.
• Ensure the proper maintenance of all equipment; makes arrangements for repair
and/or replacement of used and damaged equipment.
• Schedule and maintain regular Maintenance Assessments to insure proper function
and reduce repairs.
• Adhere to all confidentiality requirements of the property and residents.
• Ensure that attendance registers are completed daily and in accordance with
statutory regulations.
• Investigate complaints regarding housekeeping service and equipment, and takes
corrective action.
• Oversee cleanliness of common areas including stairways, supply rooms, lounge
areas and management office.
• Identify material, equipment, and supplies to be used and maintain
housekeeping supplies and inventory.
• Report damage, theft, and found articles to Security
• Complete tasks assigned by management.

Reporting
• To the Property Manager. Property Manager
Job Requirement:
Requirements
• Bachelor degree in hospitality and/or business administration.
• Minimum 3-5 years in housekeeping supervisory experience, preferably in a 3 or 4
diamond property.
• Knowledge of cleaning equipment, chemicals, and procedures.
• Strong negotiation skills and understanding of vendor relations including quotation
and ordering processes.
• Attention to detail and skilled organization.
• Ability to work under pressure and resolve problems.
• Be able to stay on feet for extended periods of time.
• Good verbal and written in English, Chinese would be an advantage
Company Profile: We are professionals in HR and MANAGEMENT CONSULTING based in Cambodia and engaged across South East Asia. We maximise the EFFICIENCY and the PRODUCTIVITY of YOUR ORGANIZATION.

Job Description:
Company Profile:
Our client is one of the leading properties company in Cambodia which has the tallest building is seeking for high energetic, dynamic, rigorous, flexible, diplomatic, and diligent candidate to fill the position F&B Manager.

Responsibilities:
- Works closely with Manager to ensure correct stock level are available from distribution area to assist the Food and Beverage team.
- Ensure and strictly compliance with all relevant Hygiene and Safety legislation and requirements.
- Good at training within the Food and Beverage team to ensure succession planning.
- Constantly review the product range to ensure that all key quality standards are maintained.
- Participate in the food development panel that sits to drive the food offer across the estate.
- Oversees and directs all aspects of the food and beverage department.
- Responsibilities include, but are not limited to, day to operation, strategic planning, and budget planning, forecasting, training and on-going development of team members. Responsibilities also require direct and routine interaction with key operational divisions within the restaurant.
- Be fully conversant with the restaurant cost control system, and be able to maintain costs within Budget constraints.
- Ensures that monthly reviews of total departmental productivity, versus goal, are conducted.
- Work closely with team members, to ensure that training is scheduled and that skill levels are maintained to the standards of the outlets.
- Ensure that all guests have good experiences with the restaurant food service.

Requirements:
- Minimum of 7 years of working experiences for the Food and Beverage operations in the Hotel & Restaurant Industry.
- Good command of spoken and written in English.
- Having sound knowledge in using POS system.
- Ability to plan and execute F&B action plan.
- Good knowledge in food & beverage products and good hygiene.
- Ability to handle the multiple tasks and reach the tight time frame.
- Ability in training the subordinates as to meet the job requirements.
- Good organization and problem solving skills.
- Be able to work under pressure and long hours as necessary.
- Pleasant personality and healthy looking and processing a good interpersonal skills.

Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00-17:00
- Working days: Monday-Sunday

Job Description:
- Follow school curriculum and particular set of course timeline,

- Submit and keep a weekly lesson plan,

- Prepare lesson to suit with student learning abilities,

- Arouse the interest of students towards the lesson,

- Maintain students’ participation,

- Clearly focus on school’s subject matter,

- Design and implement supplementary activities,

- Motivate inactive or slow learning student to be more active,

- Use English language while teaching and working in the school,

- Be proficient in all aspects of the subject,

- Address individual differences of the students,

- Diagnose learner's needs and remedy where necessary,

- Evaluate student learning outcomes through written, oral, and practical methods,

- Adhere to the class schedule and school policy,

- Maintain a clean and orderly classroom,

- Inculcate a respect for school property and facilities in students,

- Conduct Parent-Teacher conferences,

- Help in any school program daily or occasionally,

- Always look after the students’ security,

- Attend technical meetings, administrative meetings, planned school events and other school activities,

- Adopt new methodologies,

- Create standard exams for students, 

- Help school events and/or activities.
Job Requirement:
- Graduated Bachelor Degree of education with teaching pedagogy,

- Experience working with young children,

- Good health with 2 year teaching experience at least,

- Good inter-personality and strong commitment,

- Knowing English well and computer literacy,

- Creative, energetic and fun-loving with a positive attitude,

- Friendly and loves working with children,

- Punctual, responsible, and hard-working,

- Honest, punctual, responsible, hard-working and creative,

- Able to problem solve and work under pressure,

Job Description:
ក្រុមហ៊ុន​​ SIA​ ទទួលខុសត្រូវមានកំណត់ ត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសមន្រ្តីឥទានវឹកវើនជាបន្ទាន់។

១​​ ផ្សព្វផ្សាយពត៌មានទាក់ទងនឹងសេវាឥទានតាមតំបន់
២​ វាយតំលៃ និង កំណត់ពីទំហំឥណទានដល់អតិថិជន
៣ ធ្វើការទូទាត់កម្ចីរបស់អតិថិជន
៤ រៀបចំគំរោងផែនការ និង​ គ្រប់គ្រងទំហំឥណទាន
៥ ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា​ និងតម្រូវការរបស់អតិថិជន
៦ អនុវត្តទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ទូទៅរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនបានកំណត់

អត្ថប្រយោជន៏បន្ថែមរួមមាន
  ១ ប្រាក់ថែមម៉ោង
  ២ ប្រាក់រង្វាន់  
  ៣ ថ្លៃសាំង
Job Requirement:
តម្រូវការចំពោះបេក្ខជនទាំងពីេភេទ

១ មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីថ្នាក់មធ្យមសិក្សារទុតិយភូមិឡើងទៅ
២ មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់​ មឺុងម៉ាត់​ និង​ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
៣ អាចបំពេញការងារថែមម៉ោង 
៤ មានឆន្ទុុុះខ្ពស់លើការងារ​ និង អភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួនឯង
៥​ មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើកាតព្វកិច្ចការងារ
៦ ត្រូវមានយានជំនិះផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន

Job Description:
1.能灵活，耐心，诚实地完成工作任务并善于沟通。

2.工作准时，有很好的人际关系。

3.是个诚实有上进的老师

4.要时常改善，创新工作技能。

5.根据课程大纲出试卷。

- To deliver engaging and motivating lessons to students of different nationalities
- To create schemes of work and produce quality resources
- To use ICT and other learning technology when planning and implementing the lessons
- To advise and assist in curriculum development
- To monitor and report student progress
- To engage constantly parents in their child’s education
- To take active part in the on-going school improvement process
- To promote safety, well-being, and continual growth and development of all students
Job Requirement:
1.是从事老师行业，有相关的专业教育和教学培训。

2.认同老师不是无所不知的，重要的是在学习当中老师是学生的同伴。

3.要不断提高自己的知识和教学方法。

4.以身作则要有端正的举止和优良的习性。

5.根据学院的教学系统指导预备计划长期的教学方案的每日的课程教案。

6.安排活动和提供教学材料是学生感兴趣并激发学生的能力。

7.加护，安排指定的工作。出试卷，批改试卷，评估学生的表现。

- An internationally recognized teaching certificate
- Native speaker proficiency in Chinese language (written and oral)
- Superior English speaking, writing, reading, and listening abilities
- At least two years of teaching experience
- Skills in student centered teaching
- Long-term commitment
- High intercultural sensibility
- Knowledge about curriculum development
- Experience in working in an international school environment
- Self-initiative, positive work attitude, team spirit and passion for education

job title: Provincial Sales Executive (Salary 250$+Commision) for SHV, Kampot, Kep
position: Provincial Sales Executive (Salary 250$+Commision) for SHV, Kampot, Kep
Job Description:
•	Develop the master contact list and perform as first point in the provincial level 
•	Present and sell company product and service to the clients in the allocated zone
•	Prepare presentation, proposals and sales contracts.
•	Establish and maintain current client relationships.
•	Support customer through appropriate promotion, retraining, menu design……………
•	Maintain good service through quality checks and other follow-up.
•	Identify and resolve client concerns.
•	Develop and implement special sales activity to reduce stock
•	Prepare a variety of status reports, including activity, closings, follow-up…………
•	Feedback gathered information through field activity to appropriate company staff.
•	Coordinate company staff to accomplish the work required to close sales.
•	Control sales revenue , achieving sales target and follow up late credit customers
•	Corporate with designer, Barista Team, technician and Stock Controller to provide good services to the customers.
•	Develop and maintain sales material and current product knowledge.
•	Supporting Branch/sub distributor in all marketing support activities 
•	Respect company rules and policies.
•	Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
•	Available to visit customer and work at both Kompong Som, Kampot, Kep.
•	Bachelor degree, major in Sales and Marketing, English, Business Administration or relevant field.
•	Minimum one (1) year professional working experience in sales and marketing
•	Good knowledge of English proficiency both speaking and writing skills
•	Good Selling Skill
•	Good presentation skill
•	Strong internal personal skills
•	Positive attitudes
•	Able to drive Car is a plus

OTHER ALLOWANCES:
• Competitive Package to provincial.
• Sales Commission
• Petrol Card & Phone Allowance
• Yearly Bonus based on company incentive scheme
• Allowance for Training and Development program based on performance evaluation
• Award and Recognition for best employment of the year in Staff Party
• Promotion opportunity
• Maternity leave wages, Staff wedding wages and Retirement fund.
• Team Building Trip
• Personal Insurance (Forte & NSSF)
• 8 Hour working per day (8:00AM - 5:00PM) Monday - Saturday
• 18 Annual Leave
• Full of Public Holiday follow Labor Law

- Propose criteria of write-off and report applicable cases to manager timely 
- Do other tasks or over time required by management or manager if needed

- Required field collection experience at least 3 years
- Good communication in English & Khmer language (Speaking, Writing and Listening)
- Be honest, team work, and good communication skill
- Computer knowledge (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Internet & Email.

Job Description:
Our client is the first financial leasing Company in Cambodia and also international company. Our client have cooperated with Honda NCX company which provides the motorcycle lease to the customers. Nowadays, our client have cooperated with 13 Honda Dealers in Phnom Penh, and we have plan to expand to all provinces in Cambodia. Recently, we have opened vacancy for the position Loan Checking Officer to all challenging candidates.

Responsibilities:
- Check all of the documents for application and credit information collected by Credit Officer before or after field check
- Check customer’s liabilities, repayment history, and recent inquiries for other financial institutions through Credit Bureau of Cambodia
- Make a decision for field check by examining all documents for application and CBC report in accordance with underwriting policy
- Inform the request for field check to PoS if needed
-Call chief of village and commune to verify the lessee’s identity, current address, occupation and other information
- Call Human Resource (HR) staff of lessee’s company to verify employment of lessee, salary, position, and period of employment
- Complete the validation form with general comment and make a decision for approval or reject, and then send it to Senior Underwriter or Underwriter supervisor
- Provide an exact information concerning application to senior underwriter or supervisor with all documents for application as needed
- Inform the result of management validation (approve or reject) to PoS
- Report status of daily operation and its problems to Senior UW and get an instruction
- Do cooperate with another department to make process smoothly
- Other duties are assigned from senior UW or supervisor or manager if it is necessary

Requirements:
-At least Bachelor Degree in Finance, Banking, or other related fields
-Good communication in English language(Speaking, Writing and Listening)
-Be honest, team work, and good communication skill
-Computer knowledge (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Internet & Email.

- Working time: 8:00-17:00

Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
** At Satellite Pharmacy
- Control the main stock of pharmacy and keep a record of stock in and out.
- Regular management of ER stock medications using the minimum stock as a guide. Refill ER stock based on prescriptions and consumption and do monthly count with nurse.
- Report ER stock and consumption in monthly report. Add to list of medications needed as necessary. Update minimum stock for ER medication and manage medications close to expiry in timely manner.
- Do inventory of the main stock every month and count together with AHC logistic staff. Place a request to AHC store for items required.
- Make a report of near to expiry drugs month to month and inform supervisors and the clinical team if there are some drugs over stocked or close to expiry and able to be donated or circulated.
- Hold monthly meetings with the doctors to present medications going to expire and discuss any additions needed to the formulary.
- Order new stock through AHC central store taking into consideration three months or six months order time.
- Store medicine in the correct environment, (separate different kinds of drugs being used; oral, injectable, external use, follow alphabet and early expired early use) in collaboration with AHC pharmacist to facilitate proper stock control.
- Understand the AHC donation drug list and determine if suitable for pediatric or adult.
- Understand and process of waste management if expired drugs need to be destroyed.
- Maintain good communication and relationship between AHC pharmacy, main store  and SC
- Keep inventory of laboratory supplies and AMC.  Order lab supplies when necessary and work together with Chief of Medical.
- Join the monthly medical department meeting with SRH and take the minutes 

** At MoH pharmacy
- Preparation of medical supply for SRH pharmacy on request.
- Keep track and alert staff of medicine close to expiry date (Do physical count together (MoH) SRH 
staff every three months at SRH pharmacy in order to correct the quantity of drugs left over at the end of the month and monitor expiry date of drugs).
- Compile monthly reports and understand average monthly consumption and buffer stock of both SC and SRH.
- Random checking after patients/caretakers receive drugs and explanation by the MoH pharmacy staff to ensure understanding and ability to follow the prescription by SC doctors and give feedback during monthly meeting.

** Logistic Tasks between Satellite and AHC
- Cooperate with the Administration manager in logistic liaison duties between AHC and Satellite. For example medication and other items from store, paperwork to and from accounting, purchaser, admin department etc. 
- Other duties as necessary and as determined by the Satellite medical chief
Job Requirement:
- Have a Bachelor of nursing or Pharmacy assistant.
- Have experience at least 6 months to 1 year experience working in medical field or logistics in 
hospital setting.
- Sotnikum resident preferred. 
- Excellent ability to be self-directed and self-motivated
- Good organization skills and time management
- Able to relate positively and cooperatively with others, including colleagues, donors, visitors, and 
personnel of outside agencies and organizations
- Ability to effectively contribute to meetings and discussions
- Effectively analyze problems and develop well-reasoned solutions 
- Ability to identify and communicate support or training needs in order to overcome a challenge or 
fulfill a task when beyond current capacity
- Demonstrated confidence and flexible schedule
- Ability to cope with stress
- Teamwork
- Communication Skills
- Minimum office Computer skills (Words, Excels, Unicode )  
- Fluent oral and written English 
- Ability to learn and adopt new technical skills

*** How to Apply
Interested candidates are requested to submit an Application for Employment (available at HR Department 
or download from http://angkorhospital.org/jobs/job-application-forms/) along with Curriculum Vitae, cover 
letter and eligible Certificate of degree to: Angkor Hospital for Children, Tep Vong Road & Umchhay Street, 
Svay Dangkum, Siem Reap province‐district, PO Box 50, Siem Reap, Kingdom of Cambodia. Tel: (+855) 63 963 409, 099 610 885,099 567 666 or via email: job@angkorhospital.org.

** Only short listed candidates will be contacted for interview and submitted applications will not be returned.
Company Profile: Angkor Hospital for Children (AHC) is a Pediatric Hospital providing free treatment and care to the children in the Siem Reap area and Cambodia. On average 450 children and their families arrive at the hospital seeking care each day. Since opening in 1999, there have been more than 1 million visits to AHC by Cambodian children. AHC is an official Teaching Hospital and has taught more than 3,500 healthcare professionals from Cambodia. According to the latest statistics, 1 of every 20 children in Cambodia dies before his or her 5th birthday, often from treatable and/or preventable illness. Although their standard of living is steadily improving, Cambodians still suffer from endemic poverty. Therefore, AHC provides outpatient, inpatient, intensive, surgical, and HIV care, as well as other services, free of charge. Those patients or families who can afford to make small contribution are asked to do so. Over 120,000 Cambodian children are cared for at AHC every year. Our hospital also supports greater Cambodian health care self-sufficiency through its Medical Education Center (MEC). AHC was officially recognized as a teaching hospital by the government of Cambodia in 2005. The MEC provides high quality training and education to hundreds of Cambodian nurses and doctors each year. In addition, AHC serves as a training site for the World Health Organization’s Integrated Management of Childhood Illnesses Program (IMCI).
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource  (+855) 63 963 409, 099 610 885, 012 67 47 55 Tep Vong Road & Umchhay Street, Svay Dangkum, Siem Reap province-district, PO Box 50, Siem Reap, Kingdom of Cambodia   (+855) 63 963 409, 099 610 885, 012 67 47 55

Job Description:
+ Overall Purpose of the Role
•	To retain and provide business solutions 
•	To maintain/improve service quality through service agreed standard
•	To develop long term partnership with new and existing clients
•	To monitor P&L
•	To perform monthly site visit and meeting with clients 
•	To monitor day to day operation and find solution to execute on time
•	To support in implementing of best practice in cleaning standard 
•	To be able in managing multiple sites contract
+ Health & Safety Purpose: 
•	Communicate regularly with staff through formal and informal channels on safety matters.
•	Take responsibility for ensuring that a safe system of work is produced and communicated to employees prior to the commencement of the work activity.
•	Take responsibility for ensuring that plant and equipment is maintained and fit for purpose.
Ensure that work activities are properly managed and supervised.

Main Duties & Responsibilities of the Role
+ Client Relationship Management
•	Communicate effectively with clients (verbally, email and reports) in order to provide timely, accurate, challenging and innovative information.
•	Establish excellent relationships, based on mutual trust and recognition with the operation teams that deliver services to your clients.
•	Establish excellent relationships, based on mutual trust and recognition with the operation teams that deliver services to your clients.
Understand customer’s expectation and business environment.
Give our customer’s success as first priority.
+ Continuous Improvement
•	Manage on going performance and seek continuous improvement to the delivery of services in line with best practice, corporate objectives and policies.
•	Implement quality audits to achieve continuous measured improvement.
•	Implement benchmark of service costs and performance to inform the continuous improvement program.
•	Ensure the work procedure and processes are implemented correctly.
+ People Management and Leadership
•	Manage, motivate and develop people in accordance with PCS policies.
Job Requirement:
+ Experience
•	Enable to start up the contract and solve the operation issue with proven record
•	Experience in Soft service provided
•	Experience in Facility management or Total Facility Management. (preferable)
Experience of related industry (preferable)

Company Profile:
Welcome to Aplus Group

We welcome you to Aplus Consulting, considered Cambodia’s most sort after human resource partners. Established in 2008 to provide human resource and tax solutions to local and international companies in Cambodia. Our young and dynamic company has experienced significant growth and now partners with more than 100 organisations, with almost 1,000 employees placed throughout the country.1

We have built a strong team of highly qualified and experienced local and international professionals, bringing their knowledge and expertise of legal, accounting, employee migration, talent acquisition and human resource management and development. We measure our own success from the trust our clients continue to place in us to provide sustainable support services and to grow their human potential.

We sustain the heart we bring to business with our commitment to community development. We partner with universities, scholarship programs and village education to support the academic advancement of young Cambodians. We demand a lot from our team and we commend them for the extra mile they go to volunteer their time, providing on call support for village to city migrating students and  preparation for work  advice and coaching.

We sincerely thank our team, our partners, our clients for helping us to reach a stage where we can proudly hold up SME1 Asia Awards 2012. We promise to only get better at our work and our services for our sustainable success for all.

Job Description:
1. Scope of working:

Landscape architects is report directly to architecture Manager and may specialize in projects such as parks, playgrounds, roads or public housing.

2. Duties & responsibilities:

- study and discuss designs, costs and construction of projects with clients
- talk to architects, engineers and other professionals, and gather information on factors such as historical and natural conservation requirements, soil structure, drainage, rock features, existing and proposed buildings and sun and shade movements
- draw up site plans outlining site development, discuss plans with clients and seek approval
- prepare specifications, arrange cost estimates, list building materials required and detail working drawings of the site, showing features such as location of buildings, roads and walkways; land contours and drainage systems; soil conservation measures; and the vegetation to be planted, retained or removed
- investigate the heritage of sites and make plans for the management of open space areas
- use computer and video simulation packages to develop broadscale landscape plans
- supervise site work
- advise on landscape problems concerned with environmental planning.

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

Company Profile:
Zaman International School is one of Cambodia's premier independent international schools, enrolling over 1100 students. ZIS is controlled by The School Board. The school is a non-profit organization whose budget is prepared, overseen, and audited yearly by the School Board. The administration and teaching staff represent over 9 different countries. The average teaching experience of ZIS teachers is over 10 years. Our primary focus is on internationalism in order to create open-minded world citizens who have international perspective, are self-confident and conscientious, and who can function as leaders and team members in societies all over the world.

ZIS is certified by the Cambodian Ministry of Education and it is a member of CIS (Council of International Schools). ZIS also accepted as University of Cambridge International Centre. Students may enter Cambridge tests and receive a certificate.

ZIS graduates have been accepted at many prestigious universities around the world, such as Australia, Japan, New Zealand, USA, Turkey and more.

Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh   010202136

Job Description:
- Completes payments and controls expenses by receiving, processing, verifying, and reconciling invoices.
- Reconciles processed work by verifying entries and comparing system reports to balances.
- Charges expenses to accounts and cost centers by analyzing invoice/expense reports; recording entries.
- Pays vendors by monitoring discount opportunities; scheduling and preparing checks; resolving purchase order, contract, invoice, or payment discrepancies and documentation.
- Insuring credit is received for outstanding memos.
- Issuing stop-payments or purchase order amendments.
- Maintains accounting ledgers by verifying and posting account transactions.
- Verifies vendor accounts by reconciling monthly statements and related transactions.
- Maintains historical records by filing documents.
- Disburses petty cash by recording entry; verifying documentation.
- To be a Purchaser of supply and service for hotel.
- Review of purchasing including price, delivery, performance and discounts to achieve reduced supply chain costs to Council.
- Preparing of goods received noted, in order to make sure goods are matched to purchase order and in good condition.
- Develop, compile, reconcile, and/ or update information in vendor and stock databases to provide effective processing, information management and reporting.
Job Requirement:
- Cambodian
- Under Bachelor degree or fresh graduate are welcome
- Have experience in hospitality is an advantage
- Good interpersonal and communication skills
- General computer knowledge (Microsoft Office, Internet, Email, Hotel system is plus)
- Ability to work quickly and thoroughly when under pressure
- Have attention to details
- Good in English and Khmer
- Display discipline, responsibility, accountability, and punctuality

** Interested applicants should submit a cover letter, personal CV, Cover ONLY photocopies of relevant formal Education certificates such as Identify card (ID card, passport, family book),
High School certificate, university degree, etc.  HR Department, Moon Julie hotel by using the contact details below.

Note: Only short listed candidates will be notified. Applications and CVs will not be returned.

Job Description:
·         Work to help prevent harm to staff, property, the environment and the general public.

·         Formulate and develop Safety Manual for the company and implement safety program or prevent or correct unsafe environment working conditions, utilizing knowledge of industrial processes, mechanics, chemistry, psychology and industrial health and safety laws.

·         Determine requirements for safety clothing and devices, designs, build, and install or, direct installation of safety devices or machinery.

·         Examine plans and specifications and designs for new machinery or equipment, equipment rooms, telecom BTS sites, shops, office spaces to ensure all safety precautions to have been included.

·         Tour equipment rooms and other facilities to inspect fire and safety equipment, machinery and facilities to identify and correct potential hazards and ensure compliance with safety regulations.

·         Review and inspect on-site safety conditions and investigating industrial accidents to minimize recurrence and prepare accidents reports.

·         Monitor and report accidents/incidents happened to staff and the company for further measure/actions/lessons.

·         Lead investigation of all serious incidents and assist in carrying out root cause analysis and learned from experience reviews to produce recommendations on control measure to prevent reoccurrence.

·         Conduct “OHS” or “EHS” Trainings to educate employees on work safety principles, measures and policies and refresh the course on a regular basis.

·         Enforce the compliance of employees to work on safety principles and policies.

·         Provide fire safety advice contributing to the care and well being of employees.

·         Ensure night staff receiving regular training and those can respond appropriately in the event of fire.

·         Ensure that work is delivered consistently with company’s technical safety discipline procedures and guidance.

·         May conduct air quality tests for presence of harmful gases and vapors.
Job Requirement:
·         University degree in Science or Engineering, Master Degree is a plus.

·         2-3 years of relevant experience in EHS or OHS.

·         Good English and Khmer language both spoken and written.

·         Good presentation and training skills

·         Good problem solving skills.

·         Good interpersonal skills and proven ability to work well in a team environment.

·         Willingness to work under pressure.

·         Proficiency in computer skills, MS-Office, Email, etc.

·         Car driving license.

job title: កម្មការិនីដេរ1000-2000$@ Japan
position: កម្មការិនីដេរ1000-2000$@ Japan
Job Description:
វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារប្រទេសជប៉ុន​ជាកម្មសិក្សាការី​!
១-​រយះពេល១ឆ្នាំ/៣​ឆ្នាំ/​៥ឆ្នាំ
២-ក្រោមគំរោងសហការរវាងរាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជានិងរាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលជប៉ុន
៣-ក្រោម​ការគ្រប់គ្រង របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនមានអាជ្ញាបណ្ណ័បញ្ជូនកម្មសិក្សាការី និងអង្គការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល សហប្រតិបត្តិការអន្តរជាតិជប៉ុន(Jitco)
៤-គោលបំណង ៖សិក្សាជំនាញបច្ចេកទេសការងារ យកបទពិសោធន៍ កសាងស្មារតីការងារ និងសិក្សាភាសាជប៉ុន ដើម្បីបានក្លាយជាធនធានមនុស្ស

Company Profile:
Fortune Innovations Training Co., Ltd. is an International Training and Consulting firm in Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam. We are expanding our business to Cambodia, Malaysia, Singapore, and the Philippines. We are currently recruiting people with good working habits and strong desire to work with us to prepare for the completion of ASEAN Economy Community in 2015. 

Our main business is as below:
1. Operate and provide services as consultant, agent, to source and administrate (manage) all kinds of Information Technology, including, but limited to, Internet Communication, Mobile Phone Communication, and Electronic Commerce.

2. To carry on the business of providing Training Programs and Courses of Business Administration, Management, and Career Management, Languages, Academic Subjects, Vocational Skills, either Alone or in Conjunction with other Individuals, Institutions, or Companies and providing Training Programs and Courses related thereto.

3. To present Seminars or other Public Discussions on Business Administration, Management, Commerce, Industry, Career Management, Sports, Sports Management, Coaching, Fitness, Wellness, Nutrition, and related subjects.

4. To provide Consultancy services concerning Business Administration, Management, Commerce, Industry, Marketing and Distribution of Goods, Career Management, Sports, Sports Management, Coaching, Fitness Training, Health and Recreation.

5. To provide the services of Collecting, Compiling, Preparing, Publishing and 
Distributing Statics, Data and Information concerning Commerce, Industry, Finance, Health, Sports, Fitness and Recreation.

6. Operate and provide services as consultant, agent, to source and administrate (manage) all kinds of Human Resources, Domestic and International, including, but limited to Recruitment, Training, and Job (Business) Opportunities.

7. To operate the business of Health Centers, Fitness Centers, Fitness-Training Centers, Spas, Yoga-Training Centers, Sport Clubs,

Job Description:
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:

A
- Implement accounting department and supervise accounting team to ensure all accounting transactions complying to Cambodia Accounting System, Government regulations and company internal rules 
- Ensure all internal, external accounting reports to be produced on time and under correct formats Manage financial and budget plans 
- Develop company’s accounting system and administrative procedures for our company's operations 
- Check transaction documents including sales & purchases contracts for collection and payment 
- Liaise with local authorities such as taxation and labor departments for related issues 
- Control petty cash, accounts receivable and payable 
- Prepare monthly tax reports, file tax declarations with local authorities to pay VAT, Personal Income Tax, and Corporate Income Tax, and any related government fee of the project 
- Prepare monthly general ledger accounts 
- Prepare balance, financial statements (balance sheet, income statement and cash flow statement) and yearly tax finalization report 
- Ensure compliance with local tax and legal requirements 

B. 
- Receive payment by cash and Issue invoice 
- Update new customer in system 
- Report customer need payment for new term 
- Reconcile cash and transfer them to accountant at the end of the day 
- Do monthly stock counting and report to supervisor for each month 
- Receiving and verifying the inventory with the purchase order listings 
- Reporting loss, damage of the products to supervisor 
- Maintaining proper documentation processed for the receipt of the good supplies 
- Prepare purchase request for items below stock level 
- Update new stock in system control 
- Prepare stock for Purchase order 
- Receive Purchase order and check Purchase order
Job Requirement:
Knowledge, Skills & Experience
• Bachelor’s Degree or Professional Qualification in Accountancy 
- At least 3 years in General Accounting
- Good command in English
- Presentation Skill
- Experienced in Accountant is an advantage
- Proficient in Microsoft Office and accounting software
- Have a sense of responsibility, dynamic and independent 
- Deep knowledge of Cambodia Tax Laws

Key Success Factors
- Able to make quick decisions with limited information.
- Able to meet deadlines.
- Create team spirit, successful development and motivation of subordinates.
- Sensitivity in dealing with confidential information.
- Ability to persuade/influence through oral and written communication

Interest Candidate, Please submit your CV before 25th, December 2014

Job Description:
•Organizes and administers the Engineering Department, ensuring that effective work control and productivity are maintained, whilst using every means to increase motivation. Periodically reviews the manning figures, keeping a balance between under and cover staffing so that all employees are fully occupied during their hours on duty, while preventing excessive use overtime or contractors.
•Directs and supervises day to day works of general maintenance and repair to ensure that the building, its contents and its surroundings, are at all times in first class condition throughout. Identify and arranges for all work necessary to maintain this high standard whether mechanical, electrical or civil to be completed in good time.
•Draws up preventive maintenance schedules for mechanical and electrical plant or equipment, including that of other departments such as laundry, kitchen, pools, air handling units and fans, pumps, Automatic control systems etc. Incorporates these schedules into the development of a comprehensive preventive maintenance scheme. Directs and supervises the work of this assistant and his team of skilled and semiskilled tradesman in its continuous implementation.
•Ensure that all time of plant and equipments are operated in an efficient manner, during the periods required, in according with good engineering practice. Closely monitors whenever possible by means of engineering log and instrument test readings.

•To comply with all policies related to the Engineering Department
•To comply with all systems and procedures
•To maintain a high standard of Grooming and appearance at all times (even in private time)
•To wear the resort’s uniform and name badge at all times
•To be familiar with emergency, safety and first aid procedure
•To behave at all times in a manner which projects a good company image and ensure safe hygienic working environment

Job Description:
Maersk's six-month internship program allows interns to gain 'hands on' experience and work towards becoming qualified personnel. Interns will be trained in a diverse range of systems, business etiquette, given professional development and personal growth opportunities, with a potential opportunity to have a 3 month job rotation.

The Internship program will also provide the intern the opportunity to pursue a long-term career in the innovative and diversified industry of container shipping company.

Reasonable internship allowance and benefits will be provided. 

**Learning Opportunities

In this position, the incumbent will have an opportunity to acquire skills and knowledge in the following areas:
- Effective communication with internal and external customers.
- Problem solving.
- Communication skill
- Ability to handle the multi tasks in a constantly changing environment. 
- Service minded and team player
- Shipping processes and system knowledge

Specifically for Phnom Penh post:

- Container inspection and repair knowledge
- Equipment management concept and practice.
- Equipment control system
- Commercial knowledge on Sales and Customer Service processes

For Sihanoukville Post: 

- Vessel stowage
- Port operation and customs processes
- Cargo booking system and vessel schedule system
Job Requirement:
- Student in Year 4 or recently graduated or equivalent
- Positive mind-set and can-do attitude
- Ability to handle the multi tasks in a constantly changing environment 
- Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
- Computer literate especially Microsoft Excel and Outlook
- Customer centric
- For Sihanoukville post:  requirements of flexible working time, including night hours, due to relatively changing vessel schedule.

Location:
- (01) in Phnom Penh
- (01) in Sihanoukville 

Interested candidates should send CV, recent photo; cover letter, and certificates to: Maersk (Cambodia) Ltd., Human Resources Department No. 8A, Regency Complex – C (3rd Floor), Intercontinental Hotel, 298 Mao Tse Toung Blvd, 
Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Tel: + (855-23) 965 777, Fax: + (855-23) 424 700 www.maerskline.com 
Or send an email to sokunthea.sin@maersk.com no later than noon 15th December 2014.

Please state the word “Internship program - Phnom Penh or Sihanoukville” in the subject field of your email. 

** Late applicants or applications without the subject field of an email will not be considered.
Company Profile:
A.P. Moller - Maersk is an integrated container logistics company working to connect and simplify its customer's supply chains. As the global leader in shipping services, the company operates in 130 countries and employs roughly 70,000 people. With simple end-to-end offering of products and digital services, seamless customer engagement and a superior end-to-end delivery network, Maersk enables its customers to trade and grow by transporting goods anywhere - all over the world. For more information: https://www.maersk.com

job title: អ្នកបើកបរ និង ថែទាំ
position: អ្នកបើកបរ និង ថែទាំ
Job Description:
ក្នុងមុខតំណែងនេះគឺចាត់ចែងនិងទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងតួនាទីពីរ។ទីមួយជំនួយដល់ការិយាល័យនឹងបុគ្គលិក ក្នុងការបំរើដល់ការដឹកជញ្ជួននិងមួយផ្នែកទៀតជំនួយដល់ប្រធានរដ្ឋបាលបំពេញកិច្ចការដូចជាការជួសជុលខ្នាតតូច ការថែទាំលើអាគារការិយាល័យ និងសំភារះផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលកំពុង ប្រើប្រាស់នៅក្នុងការិយាល័យ នៅរាល់ពេលដែលត្រូវការចាំបាច់។ 
ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
ក- ផ្នែកបើកបរ
១- បើកបររថយន្តដែលបានកំណត់ឲ្យដោយប្រធានរដ្ឋបាល ជំនួយការរដ្ឋបាល ឬប្រធានកម្មវិធីឯទៀត។
២-ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះច្បាប់ដោយបើកបរគោរពច្បាប់ចរាចរដែលបានកំណត់រួមទាំងល្បឿនយានយន្ត កំណត់នឹងច្បាប់ផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធដល់ចរាចរ។
៣-កត់ត្រាប្រចាំថ្ងៃនូវរាល់ការប្រើប្រាស់រថយន្តចំងាយបើកបររួមទាំងរបាយការណ៏ដែលទាក់ទងទៅនិងផ្នែកថែទាំនិងជួសជុលរថយន្តផងដែរ។
៤- ត្រួតពិនិត្យប្រចាំនូវបច្ចេកទេសរថយន្តទៅតាមលំដាប់ ដូចជា សម្ពាធខ្សល់កង់ ខ្សែពាន អាគុយ ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន ហ្រ្វាំង ។ល។ ពិសេសត្រុវប្រាកដថាប្រេងម៉ាហ៊ូ្សតត្រូវតែពេញជាប្រចាំ។
៥-ត្រូវប្រើខ្សែក្រវ៉ាត់សុវត្តិភាពក្នុងរថយន្តព្រមទាំងណែនាំដល់អ្នកដំណើរឲ្យប្រើប្រាស់ផងដែរ។
៦- ជួយលើកដាក់ទំនិញចេញចូលរថយន្តរាល់ពេលដែលអ្នកដំណើរមាន និងត្រូវការឲ្យជួយធ្វើ
ខ- ផ្នែកថែទាំនិងជួសជុល
១- ពិនិត្យប្រព័ន្ឋចែកចាយអគិ្គសនីក្នុងអាគារ:
•	ត្រូវប្រាកដថាប្រព័ន្ឋអគ្គិសនីមានដំណើរការល្អ ជួសជុលជាបន្ទាន់នូវការចាំបាច់ដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបានដើម្បីឆ្លើយតបទៅនិងតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់។
•	ការប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើងនិងថែទាំជាប្រចាំទៅតាមការកំណត់និងត្រូវផ្លាស់ប្តូរប្រេងទៅតាមកំណត់នៃម៉ោង។
- ជួតសំអាតថែទាំកញ្ចក់និងប្រព័ន្ឋសូឡាឲ្យបានជាប្រចាំនិងតាមការណែនាំ
២-ប្រព័ន្ឋម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថារាល់បណ្តាញនិងឧបករណ៏ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ល្អនិងត្រូវបាន សំអាតជារៀងរាល់ពីរខែម្តង ហើយត្រូវឆ្លើយតមទៅតាមបច្ចេកទេស
៣-ប្រព័ន្ឋបំពងសំឡេង
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថាប្រព័ន្ឋបំពងសំឡេងត្រូវបានឮហើយដំណើរការដោយល្អ នៅពេលប្រជុំឬមានសកម្មភាពការងារដែលត្រូវប្រើ និងជួសជុលឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលាចាំបាច់ 
៤-ប្រព័ន្ឋសុវត្ថភាព (នៅទីកន្លែងដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបាន
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថាសំឡេងរោទ៏ត្រូវបានឮហើយដំណើរការដោយស្វ័យប្រវត្ត និងជួសជុលបានទាន់ពេលវេលាចាំបាច់
៥-ប្រព័ន្ឋទូរស័ព្ទ
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថាប្រព័ន្ឋទូរស័ព្ទទំនាក់ទំនងទាំងអស់មានដំណើរការល្អនិងប្រក្រតី ត្រូវជួសជុលឲ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលាក្នុងករណីដែលខូចខាត
៦-ការថែទាំអាគារការិយាល័យនិងជួសជុល
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថាអាគារការិយាល័យទាំងមូលសិ្ថតនៅប្រក្រតីដោយ សហការណ៍ជាមួយអ្នកសំអាត
- ផ្លាស់ប្តូរនិងជួសជុលជាបន្ទាន់នូវការបែកបាក់ខូតខាតធ្លុះធ្លាយដំបូលតូចតាច ។ល។
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថារាល់ម៉ូទ័របូមទឹកនិងប្រព័ន្ឋផ្គត់ផ្គងដំណើរការបានល្អនិងប្រក្រតី
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថារាល់ទ្វារង្អួច ។ល។ នូវល្អនិងដំណើរការជាប្រក្រតី
- 	កិច្ចការងារដទៃទៀតដែលបានស្នើរសុំឲ្យធ្វើយដោយប្រធាននិងភ្ញៀវ ដែលធ្វើដំណើរជាមួយផង
Job Requirement:
- មានភាពអត់ធន់ មានអត្តចរិកល្អក្នុងការបំពេញការងារនិងតួនាទី
- មានបទពីសោធន៏ក្នុងការបើកបរដោយសុវត្តិភាព

Job Description:
I. PURPOSE OF POSITION:  
Provide financial, Administrative and clerical support to project staff and manager so they can give primary focus to facilitating community development process.

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Assist Senior Project Manager in preparing annual budget and mid-year review budget as needed to be accurate with guideline and budget commitment from support office.
2. Act as petty cash fund custodian (if applicable) ensure that fund is properly accounted for in accordance with the guideline.
3. Assist Senior Project Manager in preparing realistic monthly project cash request using the standard form as prescribed by the National Finance.
4. Serve staff in purchasing needs. This includes purchase to be made at the project area and the purchases to be made by Operations Admin, work with Operations Admin in establishing preferred provider.
5. Responsible to properly supervise driver including schedule, fuelling, vehicle/motorbikes maintenance logbook and overtime, responsible to properly supervise the other office positions such as guards and cleaners.
6. Help staff in preparing CARD forms for advances or direct payments to be done at the Operations Office, also serve staff in sending those CARD forms on time to Operations finance.

- Bachelor degree of Business administrative.

Job Description:
I. PURPOSE OF POSITION:  
To implement all project activities in the assigned sector (education, livelihoods, social protection, and grass roots advocacy) at the local level (Village/Commune/District) 

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES:
A. Local level partnership and collaboration
1. Build and sustain collaborative relationships and develop partnerships with all stakeholders at the local level including government district offices, local authorities, community groups, other agencies and the private sector to promote sustainability of interventions and outcomes in the elimination of exploitative child labor.
2. Mobilize community groups and their local resources for planning, participation and ownership in all project interventions on eliminating exploitative child labor.
3. Build capacity (coach, demonstrate, conduct formal and informal sessions, etc) and work with the Child Labor Monitoring Committee, Child Youth Clubs and other community groups to select beneficiaries and partner with agency to implement activities.
4. Facilitate positive communication with district/commune/village authorities, agencies and other stakeholders, community and other Project Partners
B. Timely and quality implementation of specific sector activities
1. Develop work plans for his assigned target areas based on project design and overall project work plan.
2. Ensure timely implementation of all local-level project activities
3. Coordinate with Project sector/technical specialists and officers and receive technical training in order to support quality implementation of interventions and activities.
4. Collaborate with the Advocacy Specialist to disseminate information, raise awareness and conduct local-level training.
5. Support implementation of M&E, including monitoring service delivery and tracking impact on beneficiaries at the household and individual level.
C. Team responsibilities
1. Attend staff meetings and coaching sessions, submit monthly project reports and annual Performance Management Reports to Provincial (Local) Coordinators
2. Share information with other agency staff working on other programs and projects and seek to complement and synergize common projects and activities to achieve maximum impact for transformational development.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in any of the Social Sciences (Education, Agriculture, etc)
- At least 2 years experience in community development or sector project implementation
- Equip with Community Development concept
- An understanding of child labor issues and capacity to generate dialogue among a diverse range of groups
- Effective Communication and Facilitation skills.
- Patience and commitment to work with poor and vulnerable children and their families
- Confidence to network with local government officials

Job Description:
I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
To established/strengthened community-based care and child protection mechanism to provide quality services, care and protection to child victims. To strengthen community referral system for child victims who need alternative care and legal services

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Coordinate with Operational District (OD) officers and the Operation (or Program) Health Coordinator and if necessary with National Health Program and the ADP (Area Development Program) partners in designing, implementing, monitoring and evaluation the health activities of ADP.
2. Review the annual project plan and activities related to health activities with the community people and the project counterparts to make proposal for necessary changes.
3. Monitor the progress of health activities according to the set standards and indictors of the strategic planning of ADP.
4. Seek regularly advice from the Operation (or Program) Health Coordinator and the ADP Manager to ensure that the health strategy implementing follows both national strategy of WVC and Ministry of Health.
5. Assist ADP health worker counterparts in the target area in providing health education to the community when needed.
6. Discuss with government health officers (Operational District, Health Center) about technical issues and guidelines on daily implementation in order to maintain the quality of health activities in ADP.
7. Coordinate and facilitate the proposal from community (Health Center Management Committee) and health center for renovation the health facilities in the target of ADP with the ADP Manager and the Operation (or Program) Health Coordinator.
8. Coordinate in providing medical supplies and necessary drugs to health center according to the actual situation which World Vision Cambodia and the Health Center (HCs)/OD agreed, with the approval from the ADP Manager and the Operation (or Program) Health Coordinator.
9. Workout with other staff in the ADP, Operation (or Program) Health Coordinator, to assists the ADP Manager in preparing annual budget and allocate for health activities of the ADP.
10. Work closely with the ADP child sponsorship officers to monitor and follow up sponsored children health status. 
11. Represent and network with the Health Centers and the Operational Districts to maintain good working relationship and networks.
Job Requirement:
- Medical Assistant or Medical Doctor recognized by the Ministry of Health (MOH), Kingdom of Cambodia
- At least two years of field experiences in community health and Sound experience in project design, implementation, monitoring, evaluation, and report writing.
- Able to live in according to World Vision’s core values and Good interpersonal and communication skills.
- Good understanding speaking and writing in Khmer and English are required.
- Experience on computer software in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel program. Must be willing to work within a team.
- Willingness to travel and stay overnight at project sites and Driving Own Motorbike.

Job Description:
I. THE PURPOSE OF THE POSITION
To assist ADP Manager in managing sponsorship service operations and data entry through Registered Child (RC) Monitoring Form, Annual Update, ID Card Scanner in ways that meet the national and partnership standards, guidelines and policies and data quality assurance.

II. MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
- Process Sponsor Letters (SLs) / Child Reply Letters (CRLs) in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Process sponsorship business regarding Hold Management (including CSM 303, 304 and 305) in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Process Introductory Letters (ILs) in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Process new RC / Growth in STEP in compliance with the business process requirements.
- Process Water Festival Card (WFC) and Annual Progress Report (APR) in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Process queries and requests from sponsors and support office in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Process GN from support office in compliance with the STEP business process requirements and guideline.
- Process Farewell letters for support office in compliance with the STEP business process requirements and guideline.
- Process sponsorship business regarding drops of records of registered child left program and replacements in compliance with the STEP business process requirements.
- Ensure that each child folder is updated, properly filed and stored in a secure place.
- Input information on the RC Presence Monitoring Lists, supplementary RC monitoring form, ID card scanner, annual update, and child validation form into STEP as required by the partnership standard.
- Assist ADP manager in handling child death in line with the partnership standard.
- Ensure that every RC and RC caregivers are participated in and benefited from ADP activities.
- Capacity building to ADP team and or community volunteers related to correspondence standard, guidelines and business process.
- Assure quality in sponsorship correspondence products.
- Assist in Child Protection according to Child Protection Policy (CPP).
- Ensure that Child Record Management is controlled and monitored to meet the Partnership Standards.
- Process initial Child Data Validation in compliance with STEP and QuickSTEP requirements.
- Prepare and submit required reports to ADP manager and concerned stakeholders.
- Resolve all routine discrepancies in compliance with the partnership requirements.
- Assist in Annual Reconciliation in an accurate manner.
- Make request for sponsorship supplies.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree Information Technology or in any Social Science is advantage.
- Good understanding of sponsorship business process and child protection.
- Good command of English.
- Proficiency in computer—Database system management, MS Word and MS Excel.
- Effective Communication and Facilitation skills.
- At least 1 – 2 years experiences in sponsorship business or in community development project.
- Experience in English to Khmer / Khmer to English translation.
- Experience in working with children in a development context.

Job Description:
Our client is the first and only finance company in Cambodia specializing in house financing for low-medium income Cambodian households. As the company is growing, we are now seeking for qualified candidates to fill the position IT Manager.[775]

Responsibilities:
  1. Development of System
- Researching and installing new systems
- Lead the implementation of the system solution
- Install, maintain and administer IT operation and application system;
- Guarantee the smooth running of all IT systems, including anti-virus software, print services and email provision;
- Managing crisis situations, which may involve complex technical hardware or software problems;
- Preserves assets by implementing disaster recovery and back-up procedures and information security and control structures

  2. Management and Administrative Function
- Recommends information technology strategies, policies, and procedures by evaluating organization outcomes; identifying problems; evaluating 
trends; anticipating requirements.
- Evaluating user needs and system functionality and ensuring that IT facilities meet these needs;
- Scheduling upgrades and security backups of hardware and software systems;
- Providing secure access to the network for remote users;
- Securing data from internal and external attack;
- Offering users appropriate support and advice;
- Mentoring and training new IT support staff;
- Keeping up to date with the latest technologies

  3. Budgeting/Planning
- Planning, developing and implementing the IT budget, obtaining competitive prices from suppliers, to ensure cost effectiveness;
- Plan, evaluate, and improve the efficiency of business processes and procedures to enhance speed, quality, efficiency, and output.
- Maintains organization's effectiveness and efficiency by defining, delivering, and supporting strategic plans for implementing information 
technologies.

  4. Administrative Work
- Prepare monthly accomplishment report and plans for next month;
- Perform other administrative tasks that might be assigned

Requirements:
- Bachelor/Master degree in IT ;
- At least 2 years of IT work experience;
- Sound knowledge of hardware, operating and application systems
- Strong leadership, technical and analytical skills
- Possess honesty, initiative, flexibility, commitment, and good inter-personal skill
- Collaborative and service-oriented
- Able to use Ms. Word/Excel/Outlook/PowerPoint
- Be a good trainer, facilitator, mentor, and coach

Conditions and Benefits:
- Working time: 8:00am-12:00pm | 1:00pm-5:00pm
- Working days: Monday-Friday
- Holidays: Saturday, Sunday & Legal Holidays
- Salary Range: $700-$1000
- 13 Month Salary
- Bonus 
- Insurance Heath and accident 
- NSFF
- Staff Loan

Job Description:
1.​Scope of working:

Construction Worker Controller monitoring on building and construction sites by doing a range of control over construction worker.

2.​​​Duties & responsibilities:

-Manage construction material and distribute to workers
-​Supervise and direct people working on specific projects
-​Prepare reports on spoilt or damaged tools to subordinate
-​Manage unload, carry and stack building materials and place tools and equipment in position 
-​Supervise over mix, pour and spread concrete building construction
-​Maintain a standard labor working process in building sites 
-​Monitor over dismantle small structures and strip materials in preparation for new construction
-​Provide possible administrative support assign by direct manager.
Job Requirement:
3.​Qualification & requirement:

-​​ At least completed High School (grade 12 general education) or a bachelor's degree in Management or similar skills is a plus.
-​ ​1 or more years of work experience of real estate/private Company.
- Able to speak and writing English
- Computer literacy especially MS Office
- Enjoy clerical, administrative activities, practical and outdoor work
- Good planning and numeracy skills 
- Able to work as part of a team with good communication skills
- Able to pay attention to detail.
- Able to read and understand safety instructions 
- Able to follow precise directions.

4. Working Days and Hours

- Monday to Saturday: 	7:00am to 11:00pm & 1:00pm to 5:00pm

- Construction Worker Controller is based in Site/Branch, the department of Construction

-Construction Worker Controller works under supervise & report directly to Site Manager.

Company Profile:
Borey Peng Huoth was founded in 2005 and becomes one of the most prominent Property Development companies in Cambodia today.
